original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang spyod pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa'i bka' la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / phyin ci log tu ston pa las mi ston par 'gyur ba dang / sgra ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa shes pa la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /

analyzed: sangs rgyas dang 'grogs pa 'thob cing mthong ba dang / chos kyis nges pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos la'ang spyod la 'jig rten pas kyang mi gos par 'gyur ba dang / snyoms @5a *//

translated: ‚ÄúEven though they are engaged in entering the gateways, they will not be born there. Even though they practice the qualities of nirvƒÅ·πáa, they will not attain nirvƒÅ·πáa. Even though they practice the qualities of the hearers and solitary buddhas without fulfilling the buddhas‚Äô aspirations, they will not attain the definitive state of those vehicles.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la spyod kyang theg pa de dag gis nges par mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sems nag nog ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / khams sna tshogs la'ang 'jug la thams cad kyi rjes su'ang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la spyod kyang theg pa de dag gis nges par mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sems nag nog ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / khams sna tshogs la'ang 'jug la thams cad kyi rjes su'ang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /

translated: to teach the Dharma while not abiding in the perception of emptiness; to speak of nirvana while not perceiving any peace; to practice for the sake of awakening while not abiding; to have vast interest while abandoning existence and nonexistence;

original: byang chub spyod mchog yon tan thos nas ni //
analyzed: byang chub spyod mchog yon tan thos nas ni //
translated: Having heard the supreme qualities of Bodhisattva conduct,

original: skye bo phal chen 'dun gyur byang chub brtson //
analyzed: skye bo phal chen 'dun gyur byang chub brtson //
translated: The great multitude aspires and strives for enlightenment.

original: byang chub yon tan mchog la dad pa bskyed nas //
analyzed: byang chub yon tan mchog la dad pa bskyed nas //
translated: Having generated faith in the supreme qualities of enlightenment,

original: yon tan kun mthar phyin la zhu lags na //
analyzed: yon tan kun mthar phyin la zhu lags na //
translated: I now ask about perfecting all qualities.

original: grags pa mtha' yas dag gi sems mkhyen ta ma //
analyzed: grags pa mtha' yas dag gi sems mkhyen ta ma //
translated: You know the minds of those of infinite fame,

original: rgyal ba ma gtogs dpang gzhan bdag la med //
analyzed: rgyal ba ma gtogs dpang gzhan bdag la med //
translated: Except for the Victorious One, I have no other witness.

original: rgyal ba'i yon tan lha mi shin tu skom //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i yon tan lha mi shin tu skom //
translated: The gods and men are extremely thirsty for the Victorious One's qualities.

original: stobs bcu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ste gsungs //
analyzed: stobs bcu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ste gsungs //
translated: And the conduct of the ten powers, please teach it!

original: yon tan mchog spyod byang chub yon tan byung //
analyzed: yon tan mchog spyod byang chub yon tan byung //
translated: ‚ÄúThe qualities of enlightenment arise from the practice of supreme qualities.

original: grags mdzes tshul chen khyod kyi mkhyen spyod gsungs //
analyzed: grags mdzes tshul chen khyod kyi mkhyen spyod gsungs //
translated: Please teach the conduct of knowledge of you, who are glorious and beautiful!

original: ci nas ye shes 'od zer 'phro bgyid cing //
analyzed: ci nas ye shes 'od zer 'phro bgyid cing //
translated: ‚ÄúHow does one emit the light rays of wisdom?

original: nag po'i rtsa lag dpung bcas 'joms bgyid la //
analyzed: nag po'i rtsa lag dpung bcas 'joms bgyid la //
translated: How does one destroy the forces of the dark ones?

original: ci nas stong gsum myur du g-yo bgyid pa //
analyzed: ci nas stong gsum myur du g-yo bgyid pa //
translated: How does one quickly shake the trichiliocosm?

original: de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa bde gshegs gsungs //
analyzed: de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa bde gshegs gsungs //
translated: Please teach the conduct of enlightenment, O Sugata!

original: ci nas mtshan gyi me tog rgyas 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: ci nas mtshan gyi me tog rgyas 'gyur zhing /
translated: ‚ÄúHow does one blossom with the flowers of the major marks?

original: ci nas mtha' yas dbyangs ldan 'gyur ba dang // ci @6a *//
analyzed: ci nas mtha' yas dbyangs ldan 'gyur ba dang // ci @6a *//
translated: How does one attain infinite melodious speech?

original: nas ri rab 'dra ba'i ting 'dzin 'gyur //
analyzed: nas ri rab 'dra ba'i ting 'dzin 'gyur //
translated: How does one attain the absorption that is like Mount Meru?

original: de 'dra'i byang chub sems spyod bshad du gsol //
analyzed: de 'dra'i byang chub sems spyod bshad du gsol //
translated: Please teach the conduct of the mind of enlightenment!üîΩ‚ÄúYou are incomparable, without equal, without deceit, without pretense,

original: mnyam med mtshungs med g-yo med tshul 'chos med; ;nga rgyal dgra bcom dri gsum dri bral ba //
analyzed: mnyam med mtshungs med g-yo med tshul 'chos med; ;nga rgyal dgra bcom dri gsum dri bral ba //
translated: You are the arhat who has conquered pride, free from the three stains,

original: dge sbyong mchog ste mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis bstod //
analyzed: dge sbyong mchog ste mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis bstod //
translated: The supreme ascetic, praised by the assembly of the wise,

original: khyod la mi mchog dag gi spyod pa zhu //
analyzed: khyod la mi mchog dag gi spyod pa zhu //
translated: You have taught the conduct of the supreme ones.

original: rtogs blo brtan po dran ldan me tog gsungs //üîΩ'khrul med legs spyad spyod mnga' smra ba'i mchog /
analyzed: rtogs blo brtan po dran ldan me tog gsungs // 'khrul med legs spyad spyod mnga' smra ba'i mchog /
translated: You have taught the stable, mindful, and flowery mind.üîΩYou have taught the conduct of the unmistaken and excellent deeds.

original: dri bsal skyes bzang khyu mchog phan mdzad pa //
analyzed: dri bsal skyes bzang khyu mchog phan mdzad pa //
translated: You have taught the supreme speech, the dispeller of taints, the excellent being, the leader, the benefactor.

original: ci nas rgyal 'gyur de ltar bdag la gsungs //
analyzed: ci nas rgyal 'gyur de ltar bdag la gsungs //
translated: Please teach me how to become victorious.

original: khyod las nyin mtshan dag tu 'di dag gis //
analyzed: khyod las nyin mtshan dag tu 'di dag gis //
translated: By listening to these teachings day and night,

original: mnyan nas byang chub spyod pa yang dag la //
analyzed: mnyan nas byang chub spyod pa yang dag la //
translated: And by engaging in the conduct of the bodhisattvas,

original: yid la byed pa gzhan med bde ba yis //
analyzed: yid la byed pa gzhan med bde ba yis //
translated: With no other thoughts, but with joy,

original: spyod pa 'di la mchog tu spyod par 'gyur //
analyzed: spyod pa 'di la mchog tu spyod par 'gyur //
translated: I will engage in this conduct to the best of my ability.üîΩHow can I possess samadhi and dharani?üîΩHow can I possess intelligence, prajna, and eloquence?üîΩHow can I see the buddhas in infinite directions?üîΩHow can I ask questions about what is proper and improper?

original: ci nas ting 'dzin ldan zhing gzungs ldan dang // ci nas blo dang shes rab spobs ldan dang // phyogs mtha' yas par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // tshul dang tshul min dri ba 'dri ba dang / ji ltar ye shes mtshungs med 'gyur ba dang //
analyzed: ci nas ting 'dzin ldan zhing gzungs ldan dang // ci nas blo dang shes rab spobs ldan dang // phyogs mtha' yas par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // tshul dang tshul min dri ba 'dri ba dang / ji ltar ye shes mtshungs med 'gyur ba dang //
translated: How can I attain incomparable wisdom?

original: dge ba sgo brgya dag ni sgrub pa dang // 'chad pa la ni 'khrul pa med 'gyur ba //
analyzed: dge ba sgo brgya dag ni sgrub pa dang // 'chad pa la ni 'khrul pa med 'gyur ba //
translated: And be without error in teaching,

original: stobs bcu'i spyod pa khyod la zhu lags so //
analyzed: stobs bcu'i spyod pa khyod la zhu lags so //
translated: I ask about the conduct of the one with ten powers.

original: srid pa'i bde la chags te'ang mi zhu'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i bde la chags te'ang mi zhu'o //
translated: I do not ask out of attachment to the pleasures of existence,

original: yul gyis bsgyur slad du yang mi zhu 'o //
analyzed: yul gyis bsgyur slad du yang mi zhu 'o //
translated: Nor do I ask to be transformed by objects.

original: rgyal ba'i bdud rtsi la ni bdag legs 'dun //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bdud rtsi la ni bdag legs 'dun //
translated: I aspire to the nectar of the Victorious Ones.

original: stobs bcu'i spyod pa @6b bdag la myur du gsungs //
analyzed: stobs bcu'i spyod pa @6b bdag la myur du gsungs //
translated: Quickly teach me the conduct of the one with ten powers.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: When this was said, the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva Supreme Joyful King:

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: Supreme Joyful King,

original: legs so / legs so //
analyzed: legs so / legs so //
translated: excellent, excellent!

original: chos thams cad kyi tshul la nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshul la nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
translated: There is a samadhi called 'The Teacher of the Way of All Phenomena.'

original: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de dang ldan na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de dang ldan na /
translated: If a bodhisattva possesses that samadhi,

original: yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yon tan de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will attain those qualities.

original: gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will also complete the twenty-one hundred perfections.

original: ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will attain the eighty-four thousand samƒÅdhis.

original: gzungs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will attain the eighty-four thousand dhƒÅra·πáƒ´s.

original: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa'ang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa'ang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will also understand the skill in the conduct of all beings.

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will quickly attain the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: ‚ÄúRƒÅja,

original: chos thams cad kyi tshul la nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshul la nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na /
translated: what is the samƒÅdhi called the revealed equality of the nature of all phenomena?

original: 'di lta ste /üîΩji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa nyid do //
translated: It is as follows:üîΩIt is to do exactly what one says.

original: ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du smra ba nyid do //
analyzed: ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du smra ba nyid do //
translated: It is to say exactly what one does.

original: lus dag par byed do //
analyzed: lus dag par byed do //
translated: It purifies the body.

original: ngag dag par byed do //
analyzed: ngag dag par byed do //
translated: It purifies speech.

original: sems dag par byed do //
analyzed: sems dag par byed do //
translated: It purifies the mind.

original: phan par 'dod pa nyid do //
analyzed: phan par 'dod pa nyid do //
translated: It is the desire to benefit.

original: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa nyid do //
analyzed: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: It is having a loving mind.

original: snying rje nyid mi spong ba'o //üîΩ'dod pa dag la don du @7a *//
analyzed: snying rje nyid mi spong ba'o // 'dod pa dag la don du @7a *//
translated: It is not abandoning compassion.

original: mi gnyer ba nyid do //
analyzed: mi gnyer ba nyid do //
translated: It is not seeking out desires.

original: chos don du gnyer ba nyid do //
analyzed: chos don du gnyer ba nyid do //
translated: It is seeking the Dharma.

original: dad pa chud za bar mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa chud za bar mi byed pa'o //
translated: It is not wasting faith.

original: rang gis dam bcas pa kun tu spyod pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang gis dam bcas pa kun tu spyod pa nyid do //
translated: It is practicing what one preaches.

original: nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa'o //
translated: It is being skilled in definitions.

original: sems can sgrol ba'o //
analyzed: sems can sgrol ba'o //
translated: It is liberating beings.

original: cang shes kyi las can no //
analyzed: cang shes kyi las can no //
translated: It is having the work of a noble person.

original: lus la mi brkam pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus la mi brkam pa nyid do //
translated: It is not being attached to the body.

original: sems rgyu ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: sems rgyu ba med pa nyid do //
translated: It is not having a wandering mind.

original: sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams la tshim par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams la tshim par byed pa nyid do //
translated: It is satisfying those who are suffering.

original: bde ba dang ldan pa rnams la gzengs bstod pa'o //üîΩbag med pa rnams la 'doms pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang ldan pa rnams la gzengs bstod pa'o // bag med pa rnams la 'doms pa'o //
translated: It is encouraging those who are happy.üîΩIt is instructing the heedless.

original: brtson pa rnams la 'chos pa'o //
analyzed: brtson pa rnams la 'chos pa'o //
translated: It is correcting the diligent.

original: chos la 'gyod pa dag sel ba nyid do //üîΩsems can gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos la 'gyod pa dag sel ba nyid do // sems can gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: It is dispelling regret about the Dharma.üîΩIt is not dwelling on the perception of beings.

original: dngos po'i 'du shes kyis rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i 'du shes kyis rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: It is not conceptualizing the perception of things.

original: 'dzin pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa yongs su gcod pa'o //
translated: and the complete elimination of grasping.

original: mtshan ma rnam par 'jig pa nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan ma rnam par 'jig pa nyid do //
translated: It is the destruction of signs.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa la g-yo ba med pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa la g-yo ba med pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of movement in meditative equipoise.

original: rtag tu ye shes 'tshol ba'o //üîΩ'jig rten pa'i gtam rnam par spong ba nyid do //
analyzed: rtag tu ye shes 'tshol ba'o // 'jig rten pa'i gtam rnam par spong ba nyid do //
translated: It is the constant pursuit of wisdom.üîΩIt is the abandonment of worldly talk.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam 'tshol ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam 'tshol ba nyid do //
translated: It is the pursuit of supramundane talk.

original: dran pa nyams pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: dran pa nyams pa med pa nyid do //
translated: It is the absence of a lapse in mindfulness.

original: chos rnams la brjod pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos rnams la brjod pa med pa nyid do //
translated: It is the absence of verbal expression with regard to phenomena.

original: ji ltar bya ba bzhin du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bya ba bzhin du 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is engagement in accordance with what should be done.

original: spyod pa sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa sgrub pa'o //
translated: It is the accomplishment of conduct.

original: 'jig rten shes pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten shes pa nyid do //
translated: It is knowledge of the world.

original: las la mngon par yid ches pa nyid do //
analyzed: las la mngon par yid ches pa nyid do //
translated: It is conviction in karma.

original: ma dad pa yongs su spong ba nyid do //
analyzed: ma dad pa yongs su spong ba nyid do //
translated: It is the abandonment of lack of faith.

original: mos pa mang pa nyid do //
analyzed: mos pa mang pa nyid do //
translated: It is having much conviction.

original: sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'o //
translated: It is keeping the Buddha in mind.

original: 'phel ba ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'phel ba ston pa'o //
translated: It is showing increase.

original: @7b bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba nyid do //
analyzed: @7b bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba nyid do //
translated: It is rejoicing in merit.

original: sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'debs pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'debs pa nyid do //
translated: It is supplicating the buddhas.

original: sbyin gnas la phyag 'tshal pa nyid do //
analyzed: sbyin gnas la phyag 'tshal pa nyid do //
translated: It is paying homage to those worthy of gifts.

original: bsngags pa brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsngags pa brjod pa nyid do //
translated: It is to praise others.

original: nga rgyal med pa nyid do //
analyzed: nga rgyal med pa nyid do //
translated: It is to be without pride.

original: dge ba'i rtsa bas ngoms pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa bas ngoms pa med pa nyid do //
translated: It is to be insatiable in one‚Äôs roots of virtue.

original: sbyor bas rtag tu mngon par brtson pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor bas rtag tu mngon par brtson pa'o //
translated: It is to always be dedicated to practice.

original: sgrub pa mi spong zhing rdzogs par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgrub pa mi spong zhing rdzogs par byed pa nyid do //
translated: It is to not abandon practice and to bring it to completion.

original: rgyu rkyen gyi las bya ba la 'jig rten na rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen gyi las bya ba la 'jig rten na rgya che ba'o //
translated: It is to be magnanimous in the world in one‚Äôs actions of cause and effect.

original: dam bcas pa mi 'dral ba'o //
analyzed: dam bcas pa mi 'dral ba'o //
translated: It is to not break one‚Äôs promises.

original: gzhi gcig tu mi 'jog pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhi gcig tu mi 'jog pa nyid do //
translated: It is to not be fixed on a single basis.

original: 'di kho na bden no zhes mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di kho na bden no zhes mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
translated: It is to not cling to the thought, ‚ÄúThis alone is the truth.‚Äù

original: 'dod pa'i khams la khyim mo zhes brjod pas mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams la khyim mo zhes brjod pas mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is to not engage in the desire realm, as it is called a house.

original: gzugs kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
translated: It is to not cling to the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is to not be of the nature of the formless realm.

original: ji ltar mngon par 'du byed pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par yid ches pa nyid do //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par 'du byed pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par yid ches pa nyid do //
translated: It is to have conviction in the results of one‚Äôs actions.

original: yo byad la bgo bsha' byed cing sems mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: yo byad la bgo bsha' byed cing sems mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: It is to share one‚Äôs possessions and to have an impartial mind.

original: sems can thams cad la g-yos mi ston pa nyid do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la g-yos mi ston pa nyid do //
translated: not to show contempt for any sentient being;

original: sangs rgyas rnams la mi slu ba nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams la mi slu ba nyid do //
translated: not to deceive the Buddhas;

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par mtho mi 'tsham pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par mtho mi 'tsham pa'o //
translated: not to despise the bodhisattvas;

original: bstan pa la ngan du mi brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: bstan pa la ngan du mi brjod pa nyid do //
translated: not to speak ill of the teachings;

original: rigs pa dang ldan pa dang; rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa la zhe sdang med pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa dang ldan pa dang; rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa la zhe sdang med pa'o //
translated: not to be hostile to those who are reasonable or unreasonable;

original: pha rol gyi sde rnyed pa la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol gyi sde rnyed pa la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: not to be attached to one‚Äôs own faction;

original: bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba mi spong ba'o //
analyzed: bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba mi spong ba'o //
translated: not to abandon those whose intentions are not yet formed;

original: nga rgyal spong ba'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal spong ba'o //
translated: to abandon pride;

original: khong khro ba spong @8a *//
analyzed: khong khro ba spong @8a *//
translated: to abandon anger;

original: ba'o; ;gti mug yang dag par 'joms pa'o //üîΩrnyed pa la kun tu mi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: ba'o; ;gti mug yang dag par 'joms pa'o // rnyed pa la kun tu mi spyod pa'o //
translated: to abandon delusion;üîΩnot to pursue gain;

original: ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa'o //
analyzed: ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa'o //
translated: to be satisfied with whatever one gets;

original: shes kyi khe spong ba'o /üîΩma rnyed pa la mi dga' ba med pa'o //üîΩrnyed pas khengs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: shes kyi khe spong ba'o / ma rnyed pa la mi dga' ba med pa'o // rnyed pas khengs pa med pa'o //
translated: to abandon the desire for honor;üîΩnot to be unhappy when one does not get something;

original: ci rnyed pa la bgo bsha'i ngang tshul can nyid do //
analyzed: ci rnyed pa la bgo bsha'i ngang tshul can nyid do //
translated: not to be arrogant when one gets something;üîΩto share whatever one gets;

original: gsog par mi byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: gsog par mi byed pa nyid do //
translated: not to hoard;

original: mi snyan par zer ba dang du len pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi snyan par zer ba dang du len pa nyid do //
translated: It is to accept unpleasant speech.

original: tshig srung ba'o //
analyzed: tshig srung ba'o //
translated: It is to protect one‚Äôs speech.

original: blo gsal par byed pa'o //
analyzed: blo gsal par byed pa'o //
translated: It is to clarify the mind.

original: rigs pa dang ldan pa la bskul ma 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa dang ldan pa la bskul ma 'debs pa'o //
translated: It is to encourage those who are reasonable.

original: rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa la mi brten pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa la mi brten pa'o //
translated: It is to not rely on those who are unreasonable.

original: phyir zhing 'dri ba'o; ;nang du yang dag 'jog mi spong ba'o //
analyzed: phyir zhing 'dri ba'o; ;nang du yang dag 'jog mi spong ba'o //
translated: It is to ask questions again and again. It is to not abandon solitary meditation.

original: dgon pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: dgon pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
translated: It is to not abandon the wilderness.

original: rtag tu sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa'o //

original: mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba rnams kyi snying po'o //üîΩmya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba rnams kyi shing rta'o //üîΩpha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba rnams kyi snying po'o // mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba rnams kyi shing rta'o // pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru'o //

original: rgal 'dod pa rnams kyi gzings so //
analyzed: rgal 'dod pa rnams kyi gzings so //

original: snying rje can rnams kyi mar mi'o //
analyzed: snying rje can rnams kyi mar mi'o //

original: chos ston pa rnams kyi skar mda'o //
analyzed: chos ston pa rnams kyi skar mda'o //

original: mi slu bar 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas so //
analyzed: mi slu bar 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas so //

analyzed: sbyin par 'dong pa rnams kyi nor yin no //

analyzed: grol bar 'dod pa rnams kyi rigs pa'o //

original: rtsed mo don du gnyer ba rnams dang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtsed mo don du gnyer ba rnams dang bar byed pa'o //

original: nyan par bsam pa can rnams kyi rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: nyan par bsam pa can rnams kyi rgya mtsho'o //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnams kyi ri rab po //

original: mig la dga' ba rnams kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: mig la dga' ba rnams kyi dbang po'o //

analyzed: blta 'dod pa rnams kyi bkod pa'o //

original: sems dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba'o //üîΩphyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi gnas so //
analyzed: sems dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba'o // phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi gnas so //

analyzed: mi skye ba'i bzod pa @11a *//

original: thob pa rnams kyi bsam pa'o //
analyzed: thob pa rnams kyi bsam pa'o //

original: las dang po pa rnams kyi sgom pa'o //
analyzed: las dang po pa rnams kyi sgom pa'o //

original: skyes bu shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan no //
analyzed: skyes bu shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan no //

original: zhi gnas la bskur sti byed pa rnams kyi byang chub bo //
analyzed: zhi gnas la bskur sti byed pa rnams kyi byang chub bo //

original: bdag med par smra ba rnams kyi sred med kyi bu'o //
analyzed: bdag med par smra ba rnams kyi sred med kyi bu'o //

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mo //
translated: It is the path to omniscience.üîΩIt is the equality of the birth of those who are liberated through wisdom.

analyzed: ye shes dang rnam par grol ba rnams kyi skye ba mnyam pa nyid do; ;lha rnams kyis bsngags pa'o //

analyzed: klu rnams kyis rjed pa'o //

analyzed: mi rnams kyis mchod pa'o // slob pa rnams kyis ngo mtshar du byas pa'o //

analyzed: mi slob pa rnams kyis phyag byas pa'o //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstod pa'o //

analyzed: dbang po sbas pa rnams kyi grong khyer ro //

analyzed: thabs mkhas pa rnams kyi tshul lo //

original: brtson pa rnams kyi rnyid pa'o //
analyzed: brtson pa rnams kyi rnyid pa'o //

original: the tshom rnams sel ba'o //
analyzed: the tshom rnams sel ba'o //
translated: It is the dispeller of doubts.

original: yid gnyis gcod pa'o //
analyzed: yid gnyis gcod pa'o //

original: nyon mongs pa rnams sel ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams sel ba'o //
translated: It is the dispeller of afflictions.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs so //
translated: It is the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of bodhisattvas.

original: nad pa rnams kyi sman pa'o //üîΩphyin ci log pa rnams gso pa'o //
analyzed: nad pa rnams kyi sman pa'o // phyin ci log pa rnams gso pa'o //
translated: It is the doctor of the sick.üîΩIt is the healer of those who are mistaken.

original: zug rdu rnams 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: zug rdu rnams 'byin pa'o //

original: brtson par 'dod pa rnams yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: brtson par 'dod pa rnams yid la byed pa'o //

analyzed: sgrog par 'dod pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs pa'o //

analyzed: smra bar 'dod pa rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya che ba'o //

analyzed: rnam par 'phrul bar 'dod pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul lo //

analyzed: nyan 'dod pa rnams @11b kyi 'gro ba'o //

original: blta 'dod pa rnams kyi mig go /
analyzed: blta 'dod pa rnams kyi mig go /
translated: It is the eye of those who wish to see.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam mo //
translated: It is the path to nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: ngan song rnams spong ba'o //
analyzed: ngan song rnams spong ba'o //
translated: It is the abandonment of the lower realms.

original: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dag las 'das pa'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag rnam par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dag las 'das pa'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag rnam par sgrub pa'o //
translated: It is the transcendence of the desire, form, and formless realms. It is the accomplishment of the buddhafields.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin len pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin len pa'o //

original: srid pa tha ma pa dag sengge'i gdan la 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa tha ma pa dag sengge'i gdan la 'dug pa'o //

original: chud za ba med par don du gnyer ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad do //
analyzed: chud za ba med par don du gnyer ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad do //

original: skye ba rnams dga' bar byed pa'o //üîΩlhung ba rnams 'degs pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba rnams dga' bar byed pa'o // lhung ba rnams 'degs pa'o //

original: rtsom pa rnams brtan por byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtsom pa rnams brtan por byed pa'o //

original: spyod pa'i khams rnam par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa'i khams rnam par sgrub pa'o //

original: snyoms las byed pa dag yid byed pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms las byed pa dag yid byed pa'o //

original: theg pa gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi bka' yin no //
analyzed: theg pa gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi bka' yin no //

original: 'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'o //

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o //

original: don dam pa smra ba rnams kyi sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa smra ba rnams kyi sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa'o //

analyzed: stong pa nyid smra ba rnams kyi chos chud mi za ba'o //

original: smon lam gyi sgo'i shugs mthar phyin pa'o //
analyzed: smon lam gyi sgo'i shugs mthar phyin pa'o //

original: mtshan ma med pa la mos pa rnams la brda sprod pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la mos pa rnams la brda sprod pa'o //

analyzed: mthong ba dang / btang snyoms la mos pa rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid do //

original: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la thabs mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la thabs mkhas pa'o //

original: byang chub yongs su ston pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub yongs su ston pa'o //

original: pha rol pos dpa' dgong du med pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol pos dpa' dgong du med pa'o //

original: chos smra ba la ma 'khrul bar 'tshol ba nyid do //üîΩzang zing @12a *//
analyzed: chos smra ba la ma 'khrul bar 'tshol ba nyid do // zang zing @12a *//

original: med par chos smra ba la yang dag par brten pa'o //
analyzed: med par chos smra ba la yang dag par brten pa'o //

original: chos mnyan pa la g-yeng ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chos mnyan pa la g-yeng ba med pa'o //

original: 'khor la brnyas pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor la brnyas pa med pa'o //

original: chos kyi sbyin pa la bar chad med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa la bar chad med pa'o //

original: nges pa rnams kyi dri ba la ngo mtshar du byed pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa rnams kyi dri ba la ngo mtshar du byed pa'o //

original: 'gyod pa rnam par sel ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyod pa rnam par sel ba'o //

original: sbyor ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'o //

original: ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su mi gtong pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su mi gtong pa'o //

original: 'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o //

original: ma rungs pa rnams dul bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: ma rungs pa rnams dul bar byed pa'o //

original: nyon mongs pa rnams 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams 'dor ba'o //

original: mi gnas pa la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnas pa la spyod pa'o //

analyzed: rjes su dran pa 'dod pa rnams kyi dran pa'o //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams slong bar byed pa'o //

original: 'khor bzhi la ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor bzhi la ston pa'o //

original: ro bro ba rnams kyi nang na mngar ba'o //üîΩrnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgra sgrog pa'o //
analyzed: ro bro ba rnams kyi nang na mngar ba'o // rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgra sgrog pa'o //

original: srid pa las ldog par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgo 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa las ldog par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgo 'byed pa'o //

original: mya ngan las 'das par thar pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par thar pa'o //
translated: It is the liberation of nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: lus bde ba'o //
analyzed: lus bde ba'o //
translated: It is the happiness of the body.

original: sems bde ba'o //
analyzed: sems bde ba'o //
translated: It is the happiness of the mind.

original: mkhas pa rnams dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams dga' ba'o //

original: yi dam la brtan pa rnams mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: yi dam la brtan pa rnams mi gtong ba'o //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan las mi ldog pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan las mi ldog pa'o //
translated: It is the non-retreat from the qualities of the TathƒÅgatas.

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi gnas so //
translated: It is the abode of roots of virtue.

original: mi dge ba rnams nges par 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba rnams nges par 'joms pa'o //

original: 'chal ba'i shes rab can rnams kyi bslab pa'o //
analyzed: 'chal ba'i shes rab can rnams kyi bslab pa'o //

original: rigs pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas so //
analyzed: rigs pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas so //

original: bslu ba med par @12b mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: bslu ba med par @12b mtshon pa'o //

original: sangs rgyas kyi snang ba sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi snang ba sgrub pa'o //

original: ye shes kyi phung po'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi phung po'i snang ba'o //

original: sangs rgyas kyi shing ston pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi shing ston pa'o //

original: dri ba bye ba snyed 'dri ba'o //
analyzed: dri ba bye ba snyed 'dri ba'o //

analyzed: chos dkar po dag la rtog pa'o //

analyzed: skyo ba'i blo can rnams kyi dmigs pa'o //

analyzed: shes rab chung ba rnams chud mi za ba'o //

analyzed: rig pa can rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba'o //

analyzed: smra 'dod pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i rgyu'o //

original: chos ston pa rnams srung ba'o /
analyzed: chos ston pa rnams srung ba'o /
translated: the protection of those who teach the Dharma,

original: rgyu thams cad yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu thams cad yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: the complete knowledge of all causes,

original: chos thams cad la thabs mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la thabs mkhas pa'o //
translated: the skillful means in all dharmas,

original: rtog pa'i thabs grub pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa'i thabs grub pa'o //

analyzed: de kho na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba'o; ;bdag la brda sprod pa'o //

analyzed: dra ba gcod pa'o //

analyzed: ma rig pa sel ba'o //

original: phung po rnams yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: phung po rnams yongs su shes pa'o //

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su shes pa'o //

analyzed: ming dang gzugs sdud pa'o //

analyzed: skye mched drug mthong ba'o //

original: reg pa yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa yongs su shes pa'o //

analyzed: tshor ba shes pa'o // sred pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of feeling.üîΩIt is the pacification of craving.

analyzed: nye bar len pa por ba'o //

original: srid pa chad pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa chad pa'o //

original: skye ba choms pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba choms pa'o //

original: rga shi las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: rga shi las 'das pa'o //

analyzed: sdug bsngal shin tu sbyangs pa'o //

original: bde ba la kun tu rangs pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba la kun tu rangs pa'o //

analyzed: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rnam par sel ba'o //

analyzed: grub pa rnams gnas par sbyor pa'o //

original: dpyod pa rnams tshim par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa rnams tshim par byed pa'o //

original: snang ba skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba skyon med pa'o //
translated: It is the faultless light.

original: chos kyis rjes su bsgrags pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyis rjes su bsgrags pa'o //
translated: It is the proclamation of the Dharma.

original: @13a *// skyes bu grags pa can rnams kyi mthu rtsal lo //
analyzed: @13a *// skyes bu grags pa can rnams kyi mthu rtsal lo //

original: 'byung po dri ma can rnams 'khru pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung po dri ma can rnams 'khru pa'o //

analyzed: 'jigs tshogs la lta ba rnams nges par 'joms pa'o //

original: thos pa kun tu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa kun tu 'dzin pa'o //

original: chos rnams kun tu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kun tu 'dzin pa'o //

original: byang chub 'khrul pa med pa nyid do //

analyzed: cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go / bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

analyzed: ring bsrel rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /

original: mchog tu dga' @37a *//
analyzed: mchog tu dga' @37a *//
translated: Supreme Joy

original: ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: ba'i rgyal po /
translated: King!

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig po'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la khyad par can nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig po'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la khyad par can nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva, by the intention of the twenty-one perfections, obtains the excellence of all dharmas.

original: mtshungs pa med pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He obtains the unexcelled.

original: gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad zil gyis kyang gnon la srid pa'ang yang dag par 'grub par byed do //

original: the tshom thams cad gcod pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: the tshom thams cad gcod pa yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro //üîΩdes pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pas ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong dag 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro // des pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byas pas ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong dag 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He accomplishes the obtaining of omniscience.üîΩBy perfecting these perfections, he obtains the eighty-four thousand samadhis.

original: gzungs kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dag sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dag sgrub par 'gyur ro //

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa lnga brgya dag sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa lnga brgya dag sgrub par 'gyur ro //

original: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i yul la mkhas pa nyid du 'gyur ro //üîΩde skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i yul la mkhas pa nyid du 'gyur ro // de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: He will become skilled in the domain of the conduct of all sentient beings.‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul nges par ston pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mdor @37b bsdus te bka' stsal gyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul nges par ston pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mdor @37b bsdus te bka' stsal gyi /
translated: When this had been said, the bodhisattva PramuditarƒÅja said to the Blessed One, ‚ÄúBlessed One, you have taught this Dharma discourse called The Buddha‚Äôs Domain in brief.

original: don rgyas par phye ste ma gsungs pas bdag gyis ma 'tshal lo //
analyzed: don rgyas par phye ste ma gsungs pas bdag gyis ma 'tshal lo //
translated: You have not taught it in detail. I do not understand it.

original: de lta lags pas /
analyzed: de lta lags pas /
translated: Therefore,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang / skye po mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang / skye ba mang mo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba de rgya cher legs par bshad du gsol; 'de skad ces gsol pa dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang / skye po mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang / skye ba mang mo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba de rgya cher legs par bshad du gsol; 'de skad ces gsol pa dang /
translated: The Blessed One, for the sake of benefiting many beings, for the happiness of many beings, out of compassion for the world, for the welfare, benefit, and happiness of devas and humans, please explain it extensively.‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Having made this request, the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva PramuditarƒÅja,

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: ‚ÄúPramuditarƒÅja,

original: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang rgya cher bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang rgya cher bshad do //
translated: listen well and keep this in mind, I will explain it extensively.‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‚ÄúBlessed One,

original: de ltar 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de ltar 'tshal lo //
translated: I will do so.‚Äù

original: zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Having said this, the bodhisattva PramuditarƒÅja listened as the Blessed One had instructed, and the Blessed One said the following:

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: King of Supreme Joy,

original: de la yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of thorough training?

original: byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la dga' ba'i ngo bo yin yang sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
analyzed: byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la dga' ba'i ngo bo yin yang sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
translated: Even though the essence of generosity, discipline, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom for the sake of enlightenment is joy, if one has not generated the mind of enlightenment,

original: sems can gzhan su yang rung ba dag la @38a *//
analyzed: sems can gzhan su yang rung ba dag la @38a *//
translated: and does not proclaim to any other sentient being

original: byang chub ces rab tu rjod par mi byed cing smon pa'i sems yod pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub ces rab tu rjod par mi byed cing smon pa'i sems yod pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
translated: the name of perfect buddhahood, and has the mind of aspiration, these are called the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of thorough training.

original: de la snang bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snang bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of illumination?

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pas byang chub tu sems skye ba //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pas byang chub tu sems skye ba //
translated: The Dharma of the pƒÅramitƒÅs and the generation of the mind of enlightenment are the generation of the mind of enlightenment.

original: sbyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: sbyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'am /
translated: The six pƒÅramitƒÅs of illumination are the pƒÅramitƒÅs that precede generosity,

original: tshul khrims sngon du 'gro ba'am /üîΩbzod pa sngon du 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims sngon du 'gro ba'am / bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba'am /
translated: that precede morality,üîΩthat precede patience,

original: brtson 'grus sngon du 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: brtson 'grus sngon du 'gro ba'am /
translated: that precede effort,üîΩthat precede meditation,

original: bsam gtan sngon du 'gro ba'am; shes rab sngon du 'gro ba zhig gam zhes bdag nyid dpyod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni snang bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: bsam gtan sngon du 'gro ba'am; shes rab sngon du 'gro ba zhig gam zhes bdag nyid dpyod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni snang bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: and that precede wisdom.

original: de la 'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six mundane pƒÅramitƒÅs?

original: sems can la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
analyzed: sems can la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅs of generosity, morality, patience, effort, meditation, and wisdom that focus on sentient beings are called the six mundane pƒÅramitƒÅs.

original: de la sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that focus on sentient beings?

original: sems can rnams sbyin pas sdud par byed pa na byang chub kyi phyir gdams dag mi ston par sems can 'di dag bde bar gyur cig pa de ni sems can la @38b dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams sbyin pas sdud par byed pa na byang chub kyi phyir gdams dag mi ston par sems can 'di dag bde bar gyur cig pa de ni sems can la @38b dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: When they attract beings with generosity, they do not give them advice for Awakening, but think, ‚ÄúMay these beings be happy!‚Äù This is the perfection of generosity focused on beings.

original: tshul khrims kyis sems can bde bar byed pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis sems can bde bar byed pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims so //
translated: When they make beings happy with morality, this is the morality focused on beings.

original: stong pa nyid shes pa med par sems can thams cad la bzod par byed pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid shes pa med par sems can thams cad la bzod par byed pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: When they are patient with all beings without knowing emptiness, this is the patience focused on beings.

original: sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus so /
analyzed: sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus so /
translated: When they make an effort at striving in order to liberate beings, this is the effort focused on beings.

original: sems la 'dzin pa med par bya ba'i phyir bdag tu dmigs pa'i bsam gtan sems la 'dzin pa med pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan no //
analyzed: sems la 'dzin pa med par bya ba'i phyir bdag tu dmigs pa'i bsam gtan sems la 'dzin pa med pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan no //
translated: When they practice concentration focused on beings in order to make their minds free from grasping, this is the concentration focused on beings.

original: dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis sems can rnams bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go
analyzed: dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis sems can rnams bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go
translated: The six perfections focused on beings are the six perfections of the wisdom that is focused on beings, which are dedicated to enlightenment in order to protect beings.

original: / de la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: / de la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections focused on reality?

original: yi dam la brtan pa lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yi dam la brtan pa lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity focused on enlightenment is the dedication to enlightenment of the generosity that is firm in one‚Äôs commitments and is motivated by the superior intention.

original: rtog pa med pa'i tshul khrims byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo zhing bcabs pa med pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha @39a *//üîΩrol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i tshul khrims byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo zhing bcabs pa med pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha @39a *//üîΩrol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality focused on enlightenment is the perfection of morality focused on enlightenment of the morality that is free of pretense and is dedicated to enlightenment with a nonconceptual attitude.

original: nam byang chub kyi bar du sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa brtan par smon pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nam byang chub kyi bar du sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa brtan par smon pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of one who abides in enlightenment is the firm patience with all sufferings, until enlightenment.üîΩThe perfection of effort of one who abides in enlightenment is the uninterrupted practice for countless aeons, until omniscience is attained.

original: dmigs su med pas rab tu bye ba bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos kyi 'du shes rab tu phye ba ma yin zhing byang chub khong du chud pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs su med pas rab tu bye ba bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos kyi 'du shes rab tu phye ba ma yin zhing byang chub khong du chud pa de ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation of one who abides in enlightenment is the meditation that is not attached to any object, that is not attached to the notion of dharmas, and that is not attached to the realization of enlightenment.

original: nam byang chub kyi bar du chos thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / brtag tu med pas rab tu phye ba ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: nam byang chub kyi bar du chos thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / brtag tu med pas rab tu phye ba ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par ni byang chub kyi phyir gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of one who abides in enlightenment, in that it is the direct realization of all things just as they are, in that they are inconceivable and cannot be examined, is the perfection of wisdom of one who abides in enlightenment.

original: 'di dag ni gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
translated: These are called the six perfections of abiding.

original: de la 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩnam byang chub kyi bar du 'khor ba na longs spyod chen po 'thob pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de la 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / nam byang chub kyi bar du 'khor ba na longs spyod chen po 'thob pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: What are the six perfections of samsara?

original: 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving of one who, until enlightenment, obtains great enjoyments in samsara, and whose giving does not come to an end, is the perfection of giving of one who dedicates to samsara.

original: tshe'i tshad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du 'khor @39b ba na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: tshe'i tshad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du 'khor @39b ba na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of one who, until the end of life, remains in samsara, is the perfection of morality of one who dedicates to samsara.

original: gnod sems med par pha rol la snying brtse ba'i spyod pas nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gnod sems med par pha rol la snying brtse ba'i spyod pas nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience dedicated to cyclic existence is the patience of one who remains close to others through a compassionate attitude, without malice.

original: bskal pa grangs med par skyo ba med pas dge ba'i chos rnams la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med par skyo ba med pas dge ba'i chos rnams la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort dedicated to cyclic existence is the effort of one who is not discouraged by countless eons and who applies himself to virtuous practices.

original: skye ba la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation dedicated to cyclic existence is the meditation of one who focuses on rebirth.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag lhag par mthong ba'i ched du byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / las kyi gnas dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad ji lta ba bzhin shes pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag lhag par mthong ba'i ched du byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / las kyi gnas dang / bzo'i gnas thams cad ji lta ba bzhin shes pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom dedicated to cyclic existence is the wisdom of one who dedicates the perfections to enlightenment and who knows all the arts and crafts as they are.

original: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; 'dod pa'i yon tan sngon du btang ste sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa ni /üîΩdper na / sengge'i rgyal po'i bus chung ma stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po rnams nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub lam bkod gyi bar du skyabs gsum du 'gro zhing mi'i gnas na 'khod pa gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs @40a
analyzed: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; 'dod pa'i yon tan sngon du btang ste sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa ni / dper na / sengge'i rgyal po'i bus chung ma stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po rnams nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub lam bkod gyi bar du skyabs gsum du 'gro zhing mi'i gnas na 'khod pa gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs @40a
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the thoroughly afflicted?üîΩFor example, the son of the lion king, having first offered the eighty-four thousand wives,

original: *// pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: *// pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: until they were established on the path to omniscience, went for refuge in the Three Jewels and remained in the human realm. This is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving focused on the thoroughly afflicted.

original: dper na / ra gcig pa'i rdzing bur sems can la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims 'di byams pas yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dper na / ra gcig pa'i rdzing bur sems can la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims 'di byams pas yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: For example, the morality focused on sentient beings in the pond of the single goat, which was dedicated by loving kindness, is the pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality focused on the thoroughly afflicted.

original: pha rol dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan la mi smod pa gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan la mi smod pa gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience focused on the afflictive obstructions is the patience of not criticizing the sense objects in order to be in harmony with others.

original: brtson 'grus kyis pha rol skrag par byed de //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis pha rol skrag par byed de //
translated: The perfection of effort focused on the afflictive obstructions is the effort of one who, through effort, terrifies his opponents,üîΩas is to be understood in detail from the Avatamsaka Sutra.

original: dper na / ku sha'i rgyal po'i bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa las rgya cher shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;bdag tu lta ba las byung ba'i bsam gtan ngar 'dzin pa gang yinüîΩpa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dper na / ku sha'i rgyal po'i bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa las rgya cher shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;bdag tu lta ba las byung ba'i bsam gtan ngar 'dzin pa gang yinüîΩpa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation focused on the afflictive obstructions is the meditation of one who, from the view of self, has the pride of ‚ÄúI am,‚Äù

original: shes rab kyis cho lo dang / rgyan po dang / bya long gi rtsed mo la mngon par dga' zhing ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs pa dang bcas pas byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyis cho lo dang / rgyan po dang / bya long gi rtsed mo la mngon par dga' zhing ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs pa dang bcas pas byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the wisdom that delights in games of dice, gambling, and bird-like play, and that is dedicated to enlightenment with a wisdom that has an object.

original: de la gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhi na /
analyzed: de la gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhi na /
translated: What are the six perfections of benefiting others?

original: 'dod @40b pa'i yon tan gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod @40b pa'i yon tan gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of benefiting others is the generosity of one who brings sentient beings to full maturity through the sense objects of desire.

original: byams pas gzhan la gnod par mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byams pas gzhan la gnod par mi gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of benefiting others is the morality of one who, through loving kindness, does not remain in harm to others.

original: chos de la bzod cing mi smod pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos de la bzod cing mi smod pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience which is helpful to others is the patience of one who accepts and does not revile the Dharma.

original: lha dang mi'i ris kyi phun su tshogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus ni /
analyzed: lha dang mi'i ris kyi phun su tshogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus ni /
translated: The effort which accomplishes the excellence of the gods and humans is

original: dper na / brgya byin gyis gsol ba btab pas bram ze chen po kin tu zhes bya bas sems can rnams mtho ris su bkye ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dper na / brgya byin gyis gsol ba btab pas bram ze chen po kin tu zhes bya bas sems can rnams mtho ris su bkye ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: the perfection of effort which is helpful to others, as when the great Brahmin Kin-tu, at the request of Indra, led beings to heaven.

original: chos de la sems kyis sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos de la sems kyis sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation which is helpful to others is the meditation of one who applies the mind to the Dharma.

original: byang chub kyi phyir yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rkyen de dag gis sems can tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyir yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rkyen de dag gis sems can tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom which is helpful to others is the wisdom of one who, for the sake of enlightenment, causes others to take up the Dharma and satisfies beings with those conditions.

original: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /üîΩbam po gsum pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo / bam po gsum pa /
translated: The Fortunate Aeon

original: de la gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩdmigs par lhung ba'i sbyin pa rnam par bged pa la re pas phye ba gang @41a *//
analyzed: de la gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / dmigs par lhung ba'i sbyin pa rnam par bged pa la re pas phye ba gang @41a *//
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of location?

original: yin pa de ni gnas kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yin pa de ni gnas kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of generosity of location is the generosity of one who is attached to the distribution of generosity that falls into reference points.

original: dngos po la gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni gnas kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po la gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni gnas kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality of location is the moral practice of one who is attached to things.

original: sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni gnas kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩrnam par rtogs pa can gyi brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni gnas kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni gnas kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // rnam par rtogs pa can gyi brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni gnas kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience of location is the patience of one who is attached to sentient beings.üîΩThe pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort of location is the effort of one who is attached to conceptualization.

original: bdag tu zhugs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni nas kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag tu zhugs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni nas kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of concentration of location is the concentration of one who is attached to the self.

original: zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la rtog ngas rab tu phyi zhing ku nas dkris par 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni gnas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la rtog ngas rab tu phyi zhing ku nas dkris par 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni gnas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of the abode is that which is wrapped up and tied up in the Dharma of peace and tranquility.

original: 'di dag ni gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the abode.

original: de la byang chub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six perfections of enlightenment?

original: byang chub kyi phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is the giving that is endowed with the acceptance of the nonarising of phenomena for the sake of enlightenment.

original: lus dang sems la mi dmigs pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang sems la mi dmigs pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the morality that is not focused on body and mind. The perfection of patience is the patience that is in accordance with phenomena.

original: lus dang sems la mi dmigs par gnas pa'i brtson 'grus @41b gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang sems la mi dmigs par gnas pa'i brtson 'grus @41b gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the effort that abides without objectifying body or mind.

original: chos la mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan phyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos la mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan phyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the mind that is in union with the sameness of phenomena.

original: chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the thorough understanding of all phenomena just as they are.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections dedicated to awakening.

original: de la ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of wisdom?

original: rgyun mi chad par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun mi chad par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of wisdom is the generosity of wisdom that is distinguished by skill in means for the sake of ripening beings without interruption.

original: ji ltar tshigs su bcad pa lnga brgya bya ba dang / ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad rnam par spong bas rab tu phye ba sdug bsngal spang ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba spang bar bya ba ma yin pas rab tu phye ba dang /
analyzed: ji ltar tshigs su bcad pa lnga brgya bya ba dang / ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad rnam par spong bas rab tu phye ba sdug bsngal spang ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba spang bar bya ba ma yin pas rab tu phye ba dang /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the wisdom that is the basis of the five hundred verses and the ninety-six kinds of heterodox views, which are distinguished by their complete abandonment, and which is distinguished by the abandonment of the right view.

original: bde 'gro ba sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bde 'gro ba sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the wisdom that is the basis of the attainment of good rebirths.

original: ye shes rnam pas sdug bsngal bzod cing gang dag 'dod chags mi smod par pha rol po yongs su smin par byed pas phye ba gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩji ltar rta'i rgyal po rdog ldan bdag nyid sdug bsngal dang du len cing gang dag brtson 'grus kyis bdag dang gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir @42a *//
analyzed: ye shes rnam pas sdug bsngal bzod cing gang dag 'dod chags mi smod par pha rol po yongs su smin par byed pas phye ba gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩji ltar rta'i rgyal po rdog ldan bdag nyid sdug bsngal dang du len cing gang dag brtson 'grus kyis bdag dang gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir @42a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the wisdom that is the basis of the patience that endures suffering through the knowledge of the aspects of the noble truths, and which is distinguished by the patience that does not reproach others for their attachment.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the wisdom that is the basis of the vigor that is the basis of the patience that endures suffering through the knowledge of the aspects of the noble truths, and which is distinguished by the patience that does not reproach others for their attachment.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the wisdom that is the basis of the vigor that is the basis of the patience that endures suffering through the knowledge of the aspects of the noble truths, and which is distinguished by the patience that does not reproach others for their attachment.

original: gnas pa 'di ltar 'gron po lnga brgya thar par byas pa dang / 'di ltar ri dvagas kyi rgyal po sengges 'gron po rnams thar par byas pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbsam gtan yang bskyed /üîΩgzugs med pa'ang bskyed /üîΩnyan thos kyi chos kyang bskyed mod kyi /
analyzed: gnas pa 'di ltar 'gron po lnga brgya thar par byas pa dang / 'di ltar ri dvagas kyi rgyal po sengges 'gron po rnams thar par byas pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bsam gtan yang bskyed / gzugs med pa'ang bskyed / nyan thos kyi chos kyang bskyed mod kyi /
translated: The perfection of wisdom effort is the effort of the lion, king of beasts, to liberate the five hundred merchants.

original: gang dag de dag gis nges par mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang dag de dag gis nges par mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom concentration is the concentration that produces the formless and the concentrations of the disciples, but does not issue in liberation.

original: ye shes kyis chos ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ltar sman chen po dang / 'di ltar byang chub kun tu rgyu'i mi dge ba bcu rnams spong ba sems can su la'ang med pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyis chos ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ltar sman chen po dang / 'di ltar byang chub kun tu rgyu'i mi dge ba bcu rnams spong ba sems can su la'ang med pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom wisdom is the wisdom of the great physician and of the bodhisattva who has abandoned the ten unwholesome courses of action, which no other being has.

original: de la bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of benefit to oneself?

original: bdag longs spyod chen po grub par yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag longs spyod chen po grub par yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity that benefits oneself is the dedication of the accomplishment of great resources to oneself.

original: bde 'gro lha dang mir skye bar sgrub pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bde 'gro lha dang mir skye bar sgrub pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality that benefits oneself is the morality that accomplishes rebirth as a god or human in the happy realms.

original: bzod pa thob pa'i rnam par smin pa mdzes shing kha dog mchog tu rgyas pa thob pa dang / dbang che bar grags par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs @42b pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbyang chub kyi phyir gzhan la rag ma las par spyod cing /
analyzed: bzod pa thob pa'i rnam par smin pa mdzes shing kha dog mchog tu rgyas pa thob pa dang / dbang che bar grags par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs @42b pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // byang chub kyi phyir gzhan la rag ma las par spyod cing /
translated: The perfection of patience that benefits oneself is the patience that obtains the beautiful, supreme, and full development of color as the evolutionary development of patience, and obtains great power and fame.üîΩThe perfection of effort that benefits oneself is the effort that is independent of others in the quest for enlightenment,

original: bdag nyid kyi brtson 'grus kyis dpyod pa byed pa gang yon pa di ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi brtson 'grus kyis dpyod pa byed pa gang yon pa di ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: and that is undertaken by one‚Äôs own effort.

original: bsam gtan bskyed pas 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa bdun gyi bar du 'jig rten 'dir mi 'ong ba gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bskyed pas 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa bdun gyi bar du 'jig rten 'dir mi 'ong ba gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation that benefits oneself is the meditation that does not return to this world for seven eons, both during the eon of destruction and during the eon of creation.

original: pha rol gyi ngor mi blta zhing lus kyi las dang / dag gi las dang / yid kyi las bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: pha rol gyi ngor mi blta zhing lus kyi las dang / dag gi las dang / yid kyi las bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that benefits oneself is the wisdom that does not look to others, and the activity of body, speech, and mind that is in accord with the truth.

original: 'di dag ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that benefit oneself.

original: de la 'thob pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'thob pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of attainment?

original: sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa longs spyod chen po 'thob pa gang yin pa 'di dang / byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa longs spyod chen po 'thob pa gang yin pa 'di dang / byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving that is an attainment is the attainment of great wealth as the evolutionary development of giving, and the dedication of that to enlightenment.

original: rnyed pa chen po'i phyir sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbyang chub kyi phyir gzhan la gnod pa mi byed cing dam pa'i chos yongs su @43a *//
