analyzed: rnyed pa chen po'i phyir sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // byang chub kyi phyir gzhan la gnod pa mi byed cing dam pa'i chos yongs su @43a *//
translated: The perfection of morality is the morality of one who is not mentally afflicted for the sake of great gain, and who dedicates everything to enlightenment.

original: spong bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: spong bar mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the patience of one who does not harm others for the sake of enlightenment, and who does not abandon the holy Dharma.

original: brtun pa'i brtson 'grus tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: brtun pa'i brtson 'grus tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is the effort of one who has immeasurable vigor.

original: bya ba thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa gang yin de ni 'thob pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa gang yin de ni 'thob pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is the meditation of one who has attained the concentration that accomplishes all activities.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'thob pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the wisdom of one who has realized the equality of all things.

original: 'di dag ni 'thob pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'thob pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of attainment.

original: de la re ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la re ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of hope?

original: dmigs pas bskyed pa'i sbyin pa byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩlus dang ngag dmigs pa can gyi tshul khrims rnam par smin pa byang chub kyi phyir sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni re ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba gang yin par chos rnams la so sor brtags pas dang
analyzed: dmigs pas bskyed pa'i sbyin pa byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // lus dang ngag dmigs pa can gyi tshul khrims rnam par smin pa byang chub kyi phyir sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni re ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba gang yin par chos rnams la so sor brtags pas dang
translated: The perfection of giving of hope is the giving of one who has generated the thought of enlightenment through a meditative object and has dedicated it to enlightenment.üîΩThe perfection of morality of hope is the moral practice of one who has a meditative object of body and speech and who is dedicated to enlightenment.

original: du len pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: du len pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of hope is the patience of one who has investigated the dharmas as they are and who has accepted them.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i shes pas chos de dang de dag la brtson zhing pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i shes pas chos de dang de dag la brtson zhing pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort of hope is the effort of one who is dedicated to those and those dharmas through neutral knowledge.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin @43b pa byang bar byas pa'i spong ba la mtshan mang mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin @43b pa byang bar byas pa'i spong ba la mtshan mang mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditative concentration of hope is the non-grasping of the many signs in the abandonment which is perfected by the perfection of meditative concentration.

original: lung du ma bstan pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyi bor son par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyi bor son par 'gyur ram /
translated: Is it the case that one reaches the summit of the perfection of wisdom in order to understand the indeterminate?

original: mi 'gyur ram /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ram /
translated: Is it not the case?

original: yun ji tsam gyis 'gyur //
analyzed: yun ji tsam gyis 'gyur //
translated: How long will it take?

original: su zhig gis 'gyur snyam pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: su zhig gis 'gyur snyam pa gang yin pa de ni re ba'i shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: Who will do it?

original: 'di dag ni re ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni re ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of hope.

original: de la rnam pa gsum lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩ'dus byas kyi thabs kyang rgyun mi gcod la /
analyzed: de la rnam pa gsum lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / 'dus byas kyi thabs kyang rgyun mi gcod la /
translated: What are the six perfections of the three aspects?üîΩThe perfection of giving of the three aspects is the giving which does not interrupt the means of the compounded

original: 'bras bu 'dus ma byas sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dus ma byas sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: and which gives the uncompounded fruit.

original: lam la zhugs pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lam la zhugs pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The morality of one who has entered the path is the perfection of morality of the three kinds of insight.

original: phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa dang / chos 'di dag la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩthogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa dang ldan zhing lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa dang / chos 'di dag la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa dang ldan zhing lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba'i sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The patience of one who is distinguished by impermanence, suffering, and non-self in regard to external and internal things, and who is patient with these things, is the perfection of patience of the three kinds of insight.üîΩThe effort of one who has the object of unobstructed knowledge, who is endowed with insight, and whose mind is unperturbed, is the perfection of effort of the three kinds of insight.

original: bsam gtan dang / lhag mthong dang @44a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / lhag mthong dang @44a *//
translated: The concentration of one who has the object of unobstructed knowledge, who is endowed with insight, and whose mind is unperturbed, is the perfection of concentration of the three kinds of insight.üîΩThe wisdom of one who has the object of unobstructed knowledge, who is endowed with insight, and whose mind is unperturbed, is the perfection of wisdom of the three kinds of insight.

original: ma bral bas nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩrten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mi 'gal bar thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pas yongs su zin pas nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir gnas pa ni ma yin gyis; ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes shing smon lam gyi dus su yongs su smin par byed
analyzed: ma bral bas nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mi 'gal bar thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pas yongs su zin pas nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir gnas pa ni ma yin gyis; ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes shing smon lam gyi dus su yongs su smin par byed
translated: The perfection of concentration that is like a threefold view is the stability that, without being separate from those afflictions, is for the sake of completely pacifying them.

original: pa dang ldan pa'i gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: pa dang ldan pa'i gang yin pa de ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is like a threefold view is the stability that is not for the sake of abandoning afflictions through skill in means and wisdom that is not in contradiction with dependent origination, but rather is for the sake of complete understanding as it is and the possession of the ripening of aspirations.

original: 'di dag ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam pa gsum lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are like a threefold view.

original: de la las byas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la las byas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of action?

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po dang ldan pas sems can rnams la sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni las byed pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po dang ldan pas sems can rnams la sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni las byed pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity that is the action of giving to sentient beings through possessing the means of attraction is the perfection of generosity that is the action.

original: tshul khrims kyis skye bo mang po smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni las byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis skye bo mang po smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni las byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of morality that is the action is the morality that ripens many beings.

original: dper na / sreg pa'i skyes pa'i rabs las me bsad pa dang / sems can thar par byas pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na / sreg pa'i skyes pa'i rabs las me bsad pa dang / sems can thar par byas pa lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it is like the Jataka of the partridge, where he extinguished the fire and freed the sentient beings.

original: de'ang gang gi phyir blta zhe na //
analyzed: de'ang gang gi phyir blta zhe na //
translated: If one asks why,

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i phyir skye bo rnams la snyan par smra ba'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i phyir skye bo rnams la snyan par smra ba'o //
translated: it is because one speaks pleasantly to beings for the sake of the means of attraction.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas skye bo mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir @44b gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas skye bo mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir @44b gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of patience that is the action is the patience that is the basis for ripening many beings.

original: dper na / ka lingka'i rgyal pos lus dum bu brgyad du gtubs kyang bzod pa ma btang ba dang / ji ltar mgo bcad kyang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang tu len pa'i bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: dper na / ka lingka'i rgyal pos lus dum bu brgyad du gtubs kyang bzod pa ma btang ba dang / ji ltar mgo bcad kyang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang tu len pa'i bar du sbyar te /
translated: For example, the king of Kali·πÖga cut his body into eight pieces, but he did not give up his patience.

original: thams cad du dka' ba spyad pa de ni las byed pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad du dka' ba spyad pa de ni las byed pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of patience that performs tasks is the patience of one who practices austerities in all situations, even to the point of accepting the feelings of pain that come from having one's head cut off.

original: de'ang gang gi phyir blta zhe na /
analyzed: de'ang gang gi phyir blta zhe na /
translated: If it is asked for what purpose one should view that,

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i phyir don spyod pa'o //üîΩsnying rje chen po sngon du btang ste /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i phyir don spyod pa'o // snying rje chen po sngon du btang ste /
translated: it is for the purpose of the means of attraction, the performance of benefits.üîΩThe perfection of effort that performs tasks is the effort of one who, having previously generated great compassion,

original: dus shes pa dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis skye bo mang po yongs su smon par bya ba dang / sems can rnams la skul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni las byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: dus shes pa dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus kyis skye bo mang po yongs su smon par bya ba dang / sems can rnams la skul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni las byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: encourages sentient beings with the effort of knowing the time, in order to benefit many beings and to ripen sentient beings.

original: de'ang gang gi phyir blta zhe na /
analyzed: de'ang gang gi phyir blta zhe na /
translated: If it is asked for what purpose one should view that,

original: bsdu ba'i dngos pa'i phyir don mthun pa'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos pa'i phyir don mthun pa'o //
translated: it is for the purpose of the means of attraction, the performance of benefits.

original: bsam gtan yongs su sbyang bar ma byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni las byed pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste; de'ang gang gi phyir blta zhe
analyzed: bsam gtan yongs su sbyang bar ma byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni las byed pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste; de'ang gang gi phyir blta zhe
translated: For what purpose is it viewed?

original: na / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi sgo'i phyir ro //
analyzed: na / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi sgo'i phyir ro //
translated: For the sake of the door of liberation that is emptiness.

original: shes rab kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad la rmongs pa med par gnas shing /
analyzed: shes rab kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad la rmongs pa med par gnas shing /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that performs actions is the wisdom of one who, through wisdom, abides without confusion with regard to all virtuous qualities,üîΩwho causes many beings to be correctly engaged in awakening, and who,

original: skye bo mang po byang chub kyi phyir yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / dngos po ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes la /
analyzed: skye bo mang po byang chub kyi phyir yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / dngos po ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes la /
translated: through understanding things as they are,

original: chung du na rnam par thar pa smon pa med pa'i sgo yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa @45a *//üîΩde ni las byed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: chung du na rnam par thar pa smon pa med pa'i sgo yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa @45a *// de ni las byed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: upholds the door of liberation that is wishlessness.

original: 'di dag ni las byed pa'i pha rol tu phyi pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni las byed pa'i pha rol tu phyi pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that perform actions.

original: de la lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the path of complete training?

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs shing ltas dang dge mtshan spangs pa'i sbyin pa ldan pa ma yin par yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs shing ltas dang dge mtshan spangs pa'i sbyin pa ldan pa ma yin par yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving of the path of complete training is the dedication of giving that is not associated with the correct view, and that is free of omens and good luck charms.

original: yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality of the path of complete training is the morality that is associated with correct speech, correct livelihood, and correct action.

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience of the path of complete training is the patience of not abandoning the acceptance of the Dharma of non-arising.

original: lus dang sems la mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang sems la mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort of the path of complete training is the effort of not objectifying body and mind.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ma g-yeng ba gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ma g-yeng ba gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation of the path of great purification is the unm ind edness of the samadhi w ith o u t objective referent.

original: mtshan mar 'dzin pa med pas shes rab yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan la yang dag pa'i dran pa bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs gcig pa mthar phyin par bya ba dang // phyir mi ldog par @45b bya ba'i phyir gnas pa gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan mar 'dzin pa med pas shes rab yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan la yang dag pa'i dran pa bskyed pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs gcig pa mthar phyin par bya ba dang // phyir mi ldog par @45b bya ba'i phyir gnas pa gang yin pa de ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom of the path of great purification is the w isdom of right view, w ith o u t grasping at signs, and the m astery of the one-pointedness of the m ind of enlightenm ent that produces right mindfulness.

original: 'di dag ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of the path of great purification.

original: de la brtson pa mi 'dor pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtson pa mi 'dor pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: W hat are the six paramitas of never abandoning effort?

original: dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba byang chub kyi phyir thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba byang chub kyi phyir thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of not abandoning striving is the generosity of one who gives away all things, dedicating them to enlightenment through skill in means.

original: sems can rnams bde 'gro thob par bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa sngon du btang ba nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sems can rnams bde 'gro thob par bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa sngon du btang ba nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of morality of not abandoning striving is the morality of one who, in order to bring beings to the higher realms, is established in irreproachable morality, preceded by nonapprehending.

original: dper na / dga' ldan nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ba na stong gsum g-yo ba dang / gnas par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa 'dzin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dper na / dga' ldan nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ba na stong gsum g-yo ba dang / gnas par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa 'dzin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: For example, when a Bodhisattva transmigrates from Tushita, the three-thousand-fold world-realms tremble, and he takes hold of the perfection of the pure Buddha-field in order to remain. This is the perfection of morality of not abandoning striving.

original: bzod pas pha rol gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pas pha rol gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of one who does not abandon effort is the patience of one who remains in order to establish the roots of virtue of others and who is not defiled by the eight worldly concerns.

original: brtson 'grus kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / sems can rnams la byams pas yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / sems can rnams la byams pas yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort of one who does not abandon effort is the effort of one who upholds the wisdom of omniscience and who dedicates it to beings with love.

original: snyoms @46a *// bar 'jug pa'i rnam pa thams cad sgrub pa'i bsam gtan tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms @46a *// bar 'jug pa'i rnam pa thams cad sgrub pa'i bsam gtan tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation of one who does not abandon effort is the immeasurable meditation of one who accomplishes all the aspects of meditative absorption.

original: chos thams cad la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir dang / gang mngon par shes pas nges par 'byung ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi /üîΩ'dor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir dang / gang mngon par shes pas nges par 'byung ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson pa mi / 'dor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of indefatigable effort is the wisdom that abides in the dedication of prayers for the sake of expertise in all phenomena and for the sake of definite emergence through higher perception.üîΩüîΩ

original: 'di dag ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of indefatigable effort is the wisdom that is applied to the vows of the bodhisattva, in order to become skilled in all dharmas and in order to attain the superknowledges.

original: 'di dag ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of indefatigable effort.

original: de la rigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the right path?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of right giving is the giving that is associated with nirvana.

original: 'dod chags dang bral bar yongs su bsngos pas tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral bar yongs su bsngos pas tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of right morality is the morality that is dedicated to freedom from desire.

original: 'gog par yongs su bsngos pas bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog par yongs su bsngos pas bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of one who is patient through being dedicated to cessation is the perfection of patience of one who is reasonable.

original: nye bar zhi ba rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort of one who is energetic in the practice of tranquility is the perfection of effort of one who is reasonable.

original: lta bar gyur pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i bsam @46b gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lta bar gyur pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i bsam @46b gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation of one who meditates in order to pacify the views and to destroy the afflictions is the perfection of meditation of one who is reasonable.

original: sngags dang / sman dang / gtsug lag dang / sa g-yo ba shes pa dang / dus tshigs dang / lo shes pa dang / yi ge shos pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gro'i lam rjes su shes par gnas shing /
analyzed: sngags dang / sman dang / gtsug lag dang / sa g-yo ba shes pa dang / dus tshigs dang / lo shes pa dang / yi ge shos pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gro'i lam rjes su shes par gnas shing /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of one who knows the mantras, the medicines, the scriptures, the movements of the earth, the seasons and years, the letters, the superknowledges, great compassion, the paths to good and bad rebirths, and who is skilled in the methods of teaching the Dharma to sentient beings, is the perfection of wisdom of one who is reasonable.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is free of attachment because of omniscience is the perfection of wisdom of reasoning.

original: 'di dag ni rigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste /
translated: These are the six perfections of reasoning.

original: de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi las blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi las blta bar bya'o //
translated: They should be understood from the four forms of fearlessness.

original: de la bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of action?

original: sems can la phan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo zhing bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa byed la gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bye bar gtogs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can la phan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo zhing bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa byed la gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni bye bar gtogs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of one who is engaged in action is the generosity of one who dedicates for the benefit of sentient beings, who gives to others, and who causes others to take it up.

original: sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of one who is engaged in action is the perfection of morality of one who accomplishes love that focuses on sentient beings.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience belonging to action is the patience that relies on the maturation of karma.

original: dge ba bcu dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩmi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / @47a *//
analyzed: dge ba bcu dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / @47a *//
translated: The perfection of effort belonging to action is the effort endowed with the ten virtues.üîΩThe perfection of meditation belonging to action is the meditation that focuses on impermanence, suffering,

original: bdag med pa la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: and no-self.

original: dge ba'i chos rnams chud mi za bar bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pas skye bo mang po la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams chud mi za bar bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pas skye bo mang po la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom belonging to action is the wisdom that, through skillful means, benefits many beings in order to prevent the loss of virtuous qualities and to eliminate nonvirtuous qualities.

original: 'di dag ni bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections belonging to action.

original: de la bya ba ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bya ba ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs that are not to be done?

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bya bar gtogs pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving that is not to be done is the giving that ripens beings through the pleasures of the senses.

original: bya ba ma yin pa'i 'byung ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin pa'i 'byung ba'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality that is not to be done is the moral practice that is not to be done, the way of the elements.

original: sred pas yongs su bsngos shing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i yul la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sred pas yongs su bsngos shing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i yul la bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience that is not to be done is the patience of one who is not to be done, who is dedicated to craving and ripens beings in the object.

original: 'jig rten pa'i gad mo dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / sngags dang / smra ba dang / brjod pa dang / cho lo dang / rgyan po dang / yo byad rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par @47b gtogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i gad mo dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / sngags dang / smra ba dang / brjod pa dang / cho lo dang / rgyan po dang / yo byad rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par @47b gtogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort that is not an action is the effort to bring sentient beings to maturity through worldly laughter, joy, play, spells, speech, expressions, games, gambling, and possessions.

original: btang snyoms dang byang chub kyi yan lag gis phye ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: btang snyoms dang byang chub kyi yan lag gis phye ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation that is not an action is the meditation that is distinguished by equanimity and the factor of awakening of equanimity.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is not an action is the wisdom that is endowed with suppleness.

original: dper na / rgyal po'i bu blun po lkugs pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na / rgyal po'i bu blun po lkugs pa lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it is like the case of the foolish, mute son of a king.

original: 'di dag ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bya ba ma yin par gtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are not actions.

original: de la rlom pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; yongs su bsngo ba dang bral ba'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de la rlom pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; yongs su bsngo ba dang bral ba'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of conceit? The pƒÅramitƒÅ of giving of conceit is the giving that is divorced from dedication.

original: bdag tshul khrims dang ldan pa byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag tshul khrims dang ldan pa byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality of conceit is the morality of one who is moral and dedicates to enlightenment.

original: nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience of conceit is the patience of one who is proud.

original: rtsom pa rgyas par byed pa gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rtsom pa rgyas par byed pa gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort of conceit is the effort that increases undertakings.

original: sgom zhing gtong ba gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sgom zhing gtong ba gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of meditation of conceit is the meditation that is given up.

original: thos pa'i bdag nyid byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ba gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: thos pa'i bdag nyid byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ba gang yin pa de ni rlom pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of wisdom of conceit is the wisdom that is dedicated to enlightenment by one who is proud of his learning.

original: 'di dag ni rlom pa'i pha rol tu phyin @48a *//
analyzed: 'di dag ni rlom pa'i pha rol tu phyin @48a *//
translated: These are the perfections of the beyond of conceit.üîΩ

original: pa drug ste /üîΩde ga las blta zhe na /
analyzed: pa drug ste / de ga las blta zhe na /
translated: These are the six perfections of the beyond of conceit.üîΩWhat is the beyond of the Dharma?

original: chos mnyam pa dag las so //
analyzed: chos mnyam pa dag las so //
translated: What is the beyond of the Dharma?

original: de la brtsams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtsams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of the beyond of the Dharma?

original: dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of giving of the beyond of the Dharma is the giving of one who does not look at the Dharma.

original: dper na / sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir rgya mtsho chen por lus yongs su gtong ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na / sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir rgya mtsho chen por lus yongs su gtong ba lta bu ste /
translated: For example, it is like the giving of the great ocean for the sake of sentient beings.

original: de ni brtsams pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de ni brtsams pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of giving of the beyond of the Dharma.üîΩThe perfection of morality of the beyond of the Dharma is the morality of one who does not look at the nature of morality and who abandons immorality.

original: tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin blta ba dang rgod pa spangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtsams pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin blta ba dang rgod pa spangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtsams pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of morality of the beyond of the Dharma.

original: tha na mgo bcad kyang mi 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de ni btsams pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: tha na mgo bcad kyang mi 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de ni btsams pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of the beyond of the Dharma is the patience of one who is not disturbed even when their head is cut off.üîΩThis is the perfection of patience of the beyond of the Dharma.

original: bya ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te rtsom pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bya ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te rtsom pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of effort of the beyond of the Dharma is the effort of one who, having overcome all actions, undertakes them.

original: dper na / rgya mtsho chen po skam par 'bad pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na / rgya mtsho chen po skam par 'bad pa lta bu ste /
translated: It is like the effort to dry up the great ocean.

original: de ni brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de ni brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of effort in undertaking.

original: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang gnas kyang bsam gtan bzhi chud mi za ba gang yin pa de ni brtsams pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang gnas kyang bsam gtan bzhi chud mi za ba gang yin pa de ni brtsams pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: It is the perfection of meditation in undertaking, since one does not lose the four meditations while dwelling in the harem.

original: 'du byed thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing zab mo mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i she rab rmongs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtsams pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing zab mo mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i she rab rmongs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtsams pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom in undertaking, since one has the non-delusion of wisdom endowed with the perception of all compounded things as like illusions and endowed with the non-perception of the profound.

original: 'di dag ni brtsams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtsams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste /
translated: These are the six perfections in undertaking.

original: de @48b dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi las blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de @48b dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi las blta bar bya'o //
translated: They should be understood from the four bases of supernormal power.

original: de la dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of virtue?

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba 'joms par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba 'joms par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity that is virtuous is the generosity that destroys the connection of habitual tendencies.

original: 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir thams cad yongs su gtong bar gnas pa dang / bag med pa rnam par spong ba dang / ngan 'gro sel ba la nye bar gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir thams cad yongs su gtong bar gnas pa dang / bag med pa rnam par spong ba dang / ngan 'gro sel ba la nye bar gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality that is virtuous is the morality that is the relinquishment of everything for the sake of the noble morality, the morality that is the abandonment of heedlessness, and the morality that is the removal of bad rebirths.

original: thams cad la bzod cing dge ba'i chos la rtsod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad la bzod cing dge ba'i chos la rtsod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience that is virtuous is the patience that is patient with everything and that is free of dispute about virtuous qualities.

original: bya bar gtogs pa thams cad la brtson 'grus zhum pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bya bar gtogs pa thams cad la brtson 'grus zhum pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort that is virtuous is the effort that is undaunted in all that is to be done.

original: bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid yul mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sems 'dul ba'i phyir gnas pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid yul mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sems 'dul ba'i phyir gnas pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: This is the transcendent virtue of meditative concentration,

original: dper na / rgyal po chen po legs mthong 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang // gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag las 'das pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na / rgyal po chen po legs mthong 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang // gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag las 'das pa lta bu'o //
translated: as exemplified by the great king Sudar≈õana, who transcended thoughts of desire, thoughts of malice, and thoughts of violence.

original: thams cad la mi gnas pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /üîΩde'ang snying rje chen po @49a *//
analyzed: thams cad la mi gnas pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / de'ang snying rje chen po @49a *//
translated: The wisdom that does not dwell on anything is the transcendent virtue of wisdom.

original: las blta bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: las blta bar bya ba ste /
translated: This should be seen as being due to great compassion.

original: 'di dag ni dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six transcendent virtues of virtue.

original: de la rno bas phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rno bas phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six transcendent perfections classified in terms of sharpness?

original: mi dmigs pa la gnas pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa la gnas pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity that is based on non-apprehension is the sharp perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems med cing dngos po bcabs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems med cing dngos po bcabs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality that is not conceited and does not conceal things is the sharp perfection of morality.

original: chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du bzod cing phyin ci log med pas bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du bzod cing phyin ci log med pas bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience that is patient with all things as they really are, and is produced without error, is the sharp perfection of patience.

original: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin la phyir ldog pa med par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin la phyir ldog pa med par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of perseverance that is based on the non-retrogression of aspiration as it really is, is the sharp perfection of perseverance.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration that is embraced by the perfection of wisdom is the sharp perfection of concentration.

original: byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na nyan thos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ma lus par shes shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na nyan thos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ma lus par shes shing /
translated: When they become bodhisattvas, they know all the perfections of the ≈õrƒÅvakas without exception,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ma lus pa shes kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang ma yin; so so'i skye bo'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ma lus pa shes kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang ma yin; so so'i skye bo'ang ma yin /
translated: and they know all the perfections of the pratyekabuddhas without exception, but they are not free from desire, they are not ordinary beings,

original: sbyin gnas kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: sbyin gnas kyang ma yin la /
translated: and they are not worthy of gifts.

original: smon lam gyis skyes pa la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i shes rab kyi pha @49b rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: smon lam gyis skyes pa la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rno ba'i shes rab kyi pha @49b rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: They are not attached to being born through aspiration. This is the perfection of wisdom of sharpness.

original: 'di dag ni rno ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rno ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of sharpness.

original: de la zab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of profundity?

original: mi dmigs pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of nonapprehending is the perfection of generosity of profundity.

original: sems can dang mthun par gnas pa'i tshul khrims zhen pa med pa de la ma chags pas mkhas pas rnams kyis bsngags pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste //
analyzed: sems can dang mthun par gnas pa'i tshul khrims zhen pa med pa de la ma chags pas mkhas pas rnams kyis bsngags pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste //
translated: The perfection of morality that is profound is the morality that is praised by the wise, which is the morality of one who is skilled in remaining in accord with sentient beings, who is free of attachment, and who is free of clinging.

original: de ga las blta zhe na /
analyzed: de ga las blta zhe na /
translated: Where is that taught?

original: dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la 'jug pa las so; ;bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par smin pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang bcas la rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la 'jug pa las so; ;bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par smin pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang bcas la rnam par rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of patience that is profound is the patience that is endowed with the realization of selflessness, that is free of the maturation of karma, and that is endowed with the maturation of karma but is free of conceptualization.

original: de ga las blta zhe na /
analyzed: de ga las blta zhe na /
translated: Where is that taught?

original: chos 'tshol ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa las so //
analyzed: chos 'tshol ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa las so //
translated: It is taught in the context of the conduct of seeking the Dharma.

original: khams gsum la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: khams gsum la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa yin la /
translated: One is free of attachment to the three realms,üîΩand one is free of attachment to the three times.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of profound effort is the effort to attain nirvana without even conceiving of nirvana.

original: de ga las blta zhe na /
analyzed: de ga las blta zhe na /
translated: Where is that seen?

original: mu stegs can gyi shes pa zil gyis gnon pa las so //
analyzed: mu stegs can gyi shes pa zil gyis gnon pa las so //
translated: In the overcoming of the knowledge of the tirthikas.

original: lam dang bsam gtan shin tu zab pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩshes rab kyi @50a *//üîΩpha rol tu phyin pa chos dge bar btags pa dang mi 'gal bar thams cad du thogs pa med pas phye ba nye bar zhi ba dang rgyu mthun pa spros pa med pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
analyzed: lam dang bsam gtan shin tu zab pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // shes rab kyi @50a *// pha rol tu phyin pa chos dge bar btags pa dang mi 'gal bar thams cad du thogs pa med pas phye ba nye bar zhi ba dang rgyu mthun pa spros pa med pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
translated: The perfection of profound meditation is the very profound path and meditative stabilization.

original: phyin pa ste /
analyzed: phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of profound wisdom is the wisdom that, without contradicting the designation of phenomena as virtuous, is opened up by being unobstructed in all ways, is pacified, and is based on the absence of elaboration that is the natural outcome.

original: 'di dag ni zab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of profundity.

original: de la sna tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs ster ba gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de la sna tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na; sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs ster ba gang yin pa de ni /
translated: What is the maturation of that? The various marks on the body and the perfection of eloquence‚Äîthis is the perfection of generosity.üîΩThe perfection of morality is the various moral practices that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.üîΩWhat is the maturation of that? The perfection of morality is the various moral practices that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of patience is the various patient acceptances that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.üîΩWhat is the maturation of that? The perfection of patience is the various patient acceptances that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.üîΩThe perfection of effort is the various efforts that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.

original: de'i rnam par smin pa gang zhe na lus la dpe byad sna tshogs pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par smin pa gang zhe na lus la dpe byad sna tshogs pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: What is the maturation of that? The perfection of effort is the various efforts that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.üîΩThe perfection of meditation is the various meditations that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.üîΩWhat is the maturation of that? The perfection of meditation is the various meditations that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed cing bsam pa rdzogs pa nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi zhing skyon dang bral ba de ni sems can rnams la gnod sems med par gyur cig ;ces yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed cing bsam pa rdzogs pa nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi zhing skyon dang bral ba de ni sems can rnams la gnod sems med par gyur cig ;ces yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the various wisdoms that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.üîΩWhat is the maturation of that? The perfection of wisdom is the various wisdoms that are undertaken for the sake of the Buddha-field.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of effort that is ‚Äòvaried‚Äô is the effort to bring to maturity the retinue of Sravakas, Pratyekabuddhas, and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'khor dregs pa dang / 'dod chags can gyi nang na gnas kyang sems la @50b brjed nges pa med cing dran par yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor dregs pa dang / 'dod chags can gyi nang na gnas kyang sems la @50b brjed nges pa med cing dran par yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation that is ‚Äòvaried‚Äô is the m editation of one who, even while dwelling am ong the proud and the lustful, is never forgetful and is totally dedicated to mindfulness.

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i shes rab thams cad du brjed ngas pa med cing chos zab mo ston pa la gzhan la rag ma las pa gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i shes rab thams cad du brjed ngas pa med cing chos zab mo ston pa la gzhan la rag ma las pa gang yin pa de ni sna tshogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom that is ‚Äòvaried‚Äô is the w isdom of one who, through skillful m eans, is never forgetful in all things and is not dependent on others in teaching the profound Dharma.

original: 'di dag ni sna tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sna tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas that are varied.

original: de la bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of array?

original: yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bza' ba dang btung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bza' ba dang btung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of the array is the mental creation of a buddha-field with abundant food and drink.

original: 'khor thams cad la brnyas pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
analyzed: 'khor thams cad la brnyas pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
translated: The perfection of morality of the array is the absence of contempt for any member of the assembly.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing ka tsa lindi ka ltar reg na 'jam pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi spras pa dag 'grub cing bag yod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing ka tsa lindi ka ltar reg na 'jam pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi spras pa dag 'grub cing bag yod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of the array is the creation of a buddha-field even and smooth like the palm of the hand, soft to the touch like k√¢kaca-wool, and adorned with various jewels, and the conscientious practice of the bodhisattva way.

original: 'khor tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort of the array is the creation of an immeasurable assembly.

original: 'od dang mtshan phun sum tshogs shing bsam pa'i skyon dang / rnam par smin pa dang / dregs pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩsgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas tha na dud 'gro'i @51a *//
analyzed: 'od dang mtshan phun sum tshogs shing bsam pa'i skyon dang / rnam par smin pa dang / dregs pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas tha na dud 'gro'i @51a *//
translated: The perfection of concentration of array is the concentration of one who is endowed with light and excellent marks, who is free from the faults of imagination, from the maturation of karma, from pride, and from afflictions.

original: skye gnas su gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston kyang brjed nges pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: skye gnas su gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston kyang brjed nges pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bkod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of array is the wisdom of one who, having attained the illusion-like concentration, teaches the Dharma even to beings who have become animals, without forgetting anything.

original: 'di dag ni bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of array.

original: de la thug pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thug pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections without limit?

original: sgrib pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity without limit is the generosity of one who gives with an unobstructed mind.

original: nyon mongs pa byung ba sel bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa byung ba sel bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is inexhaustible in the sense that it eliminates the occurrence of the passions.

original: sems can gyi 'du shes rgya che zhing thug pa med pa sgom la ma zhum pa dang / 'jigs pa med pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes rgya che zhing thug pa med pa sgom la ma zhum pa dang / 'jigs pa med pas rab tu phye ba gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is inexhaustible in the sense that it is distinguished by the absence of fear and by the absence of discouragement in the cultivation of the vast and inexhaustible perception of beings.

original: ye shes la dmigs pas pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes la dmigs pas pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort is inexhaustible in the sense that it is invincible through wisdom.

original: bdag med pa la bzod par gnas shing yul la longs spyod pa'i bsam gtan brjed ngas pa med pa gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa la bzod par gnas shing yul la longs spyod pa'i bsam gtan brjed ngas pa med pa gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation is inexhaustible in the sense that it is the unforgetting contemplation of the selflessness of objects and the enjoyment of objects.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas ston pa thams cad la thug pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams @51b cad la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas ston pa thams cad la thug pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams @51b cad la thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni thug pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the perfection of eloquence. The unobstructed wisdom that is the teaching of all the dharmas is the unobstructed perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni thug pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni thug pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six unobstructed perfections.

original: de la sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections focused on sentient beings?

original: byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pas yi dvagas kyi yul rnam par sbyong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pas yi dvagas kyi yul rnam par sbyong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity focused on sentient beings is the generosity that purifies the realm of hungry ghosts through being preceded by loving kindness.

original: dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;nyes pa byas pa thams cad bzod cing sems can dmyal ba sbyong bar byed pa gang yin pa de niüîΩsems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;nyes pa byas pa thams cad bzod cing sems can dmyal ba sbyong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience focused on sentient beings is the patience that endures all the faults of sentient beings and purifies the hell states.

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi dang mthun par pha rol gnon cing lha ma yin gyi skye ba yongs su sbyong ba gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi dang mthun par pha rol gnon cing lha ma yin gyi skye ba yongs su sbyong ba gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort focused on sentient beings is the effort that, in accordance with the four means of attraction, overpowers the asuras and purifies the asura state.

original: bdag nyid nye bar bzung nas sems can la bde ba sgrub pa ni /
analyzed: bdag nyid nye bar bzung nas sems can la bde ba sgrub pa ni /
translated: The perfection of meditation focused on sentient beings is the meditation that, by means of the four meditative concentrations, accomplishes the happiness of sentient beings.

original: dper na / mi 'khrug pa'i thugs dam las pha rol gyi gzhi las 'tsho zhing thugs dam bcu mdzad pa lta bu dang / mi rnams yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dper na / mi 'khrug pa'i thugs dam las pha rol gyi gzhi las 'tsho zhing thugs dam bcu mdzad pa lta bu dang / mi rnams yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: For example, it is like the spiritual practice of Ak·π£obhya, which is to live in the realm of others and to practice spiritual discipline.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas nas sems can @52a *//üîΩrnams la chos rgya chen po rab tu dbye ba 'byed cing ston la /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa la gnas nas sems can @52a *// rnams la chos rgya chen po rab tu dbye ba 'byed cing ston la /
translated: The perfection of concentration focused on sentient beings is the concentration that purifies all sentient beings.

original: nyon mongs pa rnam par byang ba la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnam par byang ba la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sems can la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom focused on sentient beings is the wisdom that, based on conventional truth, distinguishes and teaches the great Dharma to sentient beings.

original: 'di dag ni sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections focused on sentient beings.

original: de la chos la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections focused on phenomena?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pas sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pas sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving focused on the Dharma is the giving that is desired for the eighteen distinctive qualities of a Buddha.

original: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i skyes pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi sngom pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i skyes pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi sngom pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o /
translated: The perfection of morality focused on the Dharma is the moral practice of the body, speech, and mind of one who has attained the liberation of the concentration of wishlessness.

original: snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience focused on the Dharma is the patience focused on great compassion.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sngon du 'gro ba'i pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sngon du 'gro ba'i pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort focused on the Dharma is the effort that is preceded by the bases of supernatural powers.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration focused on the Dharma is the concentration that is preceded by the applications of mindfulness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa las byung ba'i gzungs ji snyed pa de dag gi yi ge la dpyod par byed cing phul ba ma yin pas sgra thams cad shes @52b shing ston la /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa las byung ba'i gzungs ji snyed pa de dag gi yi ge la dpyod par byed cing phul ba ma yin pas sgra thams cad shes @52b shing ston la /
translated: The dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ that arises from the correct discriminations is the discernment of the syllables of all the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´s, and the teaching of all sounds through the knowledge of all sounds.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin cing phyir mi ldog pa'i ston pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su 'dzin cing phyir mi ldog pa'i ston pa gang yin pa de ni chos la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The fearlessness of upholding the four fearlessnesses and the teaching of irreversibility is the perfection of wisdom that focuses on phenomena.

original: 'di dag ni chos la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni chos la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that focus on phenomena.

original: de la zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections that focus on tranquility?

original: sems la 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sems la 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of generosity is the absence of grasping in the mind.

original: sems la 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems la 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no grasping in the mind,

original: gang bden pa'i bsam pas yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang bden pa'i bsam pas yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: the dedication with a true intention is the perfection of generosity that focuses on tranquility.

original: sgrib pa lnga spong ba gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa lnga spong ba gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality focused on calm abiding is the abandonment of the five hindrances.

original: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar rtog pa'i shes pa la bzod par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar rtog pa'i shes pa la bzod par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience focused on calm abiding is the patience that is said to be the knowledge that investigates impermanence and suffering.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams 'tshol bar 'bad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams 'tshol bar 'bad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort focused on calm abiding is the effort that is the search for the dharmas of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag 'di yongs su bzung ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag 'di yongs su bzung ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration focused on calm abiding is the perfection of concentration that is the concentration which pacifies the afflictions through the possession of this factor of enlightenment, meditative stabilization.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhi gnas la dga' ba /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhi gnas la dga' ba /
translated: The perfection of wisdom focused on calm abiding is the delight in the perfection of wisdom focused on calm abiding.

original: zhi gnas la @53a *//
analyzed: zhi gnas la @53a *//
translated: The perfection of wisdom focused on calm abiding is the wisdom that,

original: dmigs pa / zhi gnas la sgom pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa / zhi gnas la sgom pa /
translated: focused on calm abiding,

original: zhi gnas la 'bab pa /
analyzed: zhi gnas la 'bab pa /
translated: falls into calm abiding,

original: zhi gnas sngon du 'gro zhing rnam par thar pa brgyad thob la gzhan gyis ma bstan par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: zhi gnas sngon du 'gro zhing rnam par thar pa brgyad thob la gzhan gyis ma bstan par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: and, preceded by calm abiding, attains the eight liberations, and does not fall into the ≈õrƒÅvaka or pratyekabuddha levels without being taught by another.

original: 'di dag ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections focused on calm abiding.

original: de la lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections focused on profound insight?

original: gang gi dang / gang gi tshe dang / gang zag gang la'ang rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
