analyzed: gang gi dang / gang gi tshe dang / gang zag gang la'ang rtog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity focused on profound insight is the generosity of one who does not conceptualize a giver, a gift, or a recipient.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' lhag par mthong ba bsags pas mi dmigs pas nges par gyur pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' lhag par mthong ba bsags pas mi dmigs pas nges par gyur pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality focused on insight is the moral practice of one who has accumulated the insight that sees the past and future, and who is bound by the vow of non-apprehension.

original: kun nas dkris te 'dug pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lhag par mthong ba'i bzod pa sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas dkris te 'dug pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lhag par mthong ba'i bzod pa sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience focused on insight is the patience of one who sees the equality of all things with a mind that is not entangled, and who is free from the notions of a sentient being, a living being, a person, and a nourished being.

original: lhag mthong la dmigs shing lhag mthong skyed par byed pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni @53b lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag mthong la dmigs shing lhag mthong skyed par byed pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni @53b lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort focused on insight is the effort of one who is focused on insight and who generates insight.

original: lhag mthong sngon du 'gro zhing lhag mthong gi dbang du byas nas bsam gtan thams cad nye bar len la thabs mkhas pa gang yin pa 'dis kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyiüîΩpha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag mthong sngon du 'gro zhing lhag mthong gi dbang du byas nas bsam gtan thams cad nye bar len la thabs mkhas pa gang yin pa 'dis kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of vows of one who is not attached, who has insight as his forerunner, and who, in the light of insight, takes up all concentrations, is the vow of one who has insight as his object.üîΩThe perfection of power of one who is not attached, who has insight as his forerunner, and who, in the light of insight, takes up all concentrations, is the power of one who has insight as his object.üîΩThe perfection of knowledge of one who is not attached, who has insight as his forerunner, and who, in the light of insight, takes up all concentrations, is the knowledge of one who has insight as his object.üîΩThe perfection of giving of one who is not attached, who has insight as his forerunner, and who, in the light of insight, takes up all concentrations, is the giving of one who has insight as his object.

original: 'dod pa rnams la thug pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gang bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dang / chos la rmongs pa med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir thogs pa med pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa rnams la thug pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gang bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dang / chos la rmongs pa med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir thogs pa med pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: The perfection of morality of one who is not attached, who has insight as his forerunner, and who, in the light of insight, takes up all concentrations, is the morality of one who has insight as his object.üîΩThe perfection of patience of one who is not attached, who has insight as his forerunner, and who, in the light of insight, takes up all concentrations, is the patience of one who has insight as his object.

original: zag pa med par zhugs shing snying rje chen po'i 'dus byas dang ldan pas bdag yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / rang gi las ma g-yos pa gang yin pa dang / lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: zag pa med par zhugs shing snying rje chen po'i 'dus byas dang ldan pas bdag yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / rang gi las ma g-yos pa gang yin pa dang / lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: It is to bring oneself to maturity, to bring sentient beings to maturity, and to not move from one‚Äôs own activity. It is the perfection of insight that focuses on profound insight.

original: 'di dag ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that focus on profound insight.

original: de la thams cad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩchos thams cad dbul ba ma yin pa'i 'thob pa'i phyir sbyin pa yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de la thams cad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / chos thams cad dbul ba ma yin pa'i 'thob pa'i phyir sbyin pa yongs su bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections that are all-inclusive?üîΩThe perfection of generosity that is all-inclusive is the dedication of generosity that is not poor in the attainment of all dharmas.

original: sems can thams cad la bde bar yongs su bsngos pa ni snying rje chen pos yongs su bsngos @54a /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bde bar yongs su bsngos pa ni snying rje chen pos yongs su bsngos @54a /
translated: The perfection of morality that is all-inclusive is the moral practice of one who is not poor in the attainment of all dharmas.

original: la; ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa 'gyod pa med pa'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩphyir mi ldog pa'i chos sgrub cing yi dam brtan por 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩdad pa sngon du 'gro ba'i shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa'i rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: la; ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa 'gyod pa med pa'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // phyir mi ldog pa'i chos sgrub cing yi dam brtan por 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // dad pa sngon du 'gro ba'i shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa'i rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of the universal is the root of non-remorse, which is the result of the cause of the completion of knowledge.üîΩThe perfection of patience of the universal is the firm holding of the vow of practice of the irreversible Dharma.üîΩThe perfection of vigor of the universal is the effort which is embraced by the wisdom which is preceded by faith.üîΩ

original: dpyod pa yang dag pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyor ba dpag tu med pa thogs pa med pa mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rigs kyi chos la gnas shing dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis brtan pa 'gyod pas zhum pa med par sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa 'jig rten pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rigs kyi chos la gnas shing dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis brtan pa 'gyod pas zhum pa med par sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa 'jig rten pa dang /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of one who is steadfast in the Dharma of the family, who is endowed with faith, diligence, mindfulness, and concentration, who is not discouraged by regret, who is engaged in skillful means, and who is endowed with the knowledge of the world,

original: slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chos thams cad mkhyen pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chos thams cad mkhyen pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni thams cad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: of one who is endowed with the knowledge of the disciples and the knowledge of the solitary buddhas, and of one who is endowed with the knowledge of the unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening that arises from the knowledge of all phenomena‚Äîthis is the perfection of wisdom of one who is endowed with everything.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the

original: thams @54b cad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: thams @54b cad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: six perfections of one who is endowed with everything.

original: de la phyogs gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyogs gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúNow, what are the six perfections of one who is partial?

original: byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems kyis sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems kyis sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of a bodhisattva who gives with his own mind is the perfection of generosity of one who is partial.

original: chos la kha cig tu tshul khrims kyi 'du shes /
analyzed: chos la kha cig tu tshul khrims kyi 'du shes /
translated: In regard to the Dharma, some have the idea of morality,

original: kha cig tu ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'du shes gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'du shes gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: and some have the idea of immorality. This is the perfection of morality of one part.

original: dmigs pa gnas pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa gnas pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The patience which is the basis of the object is the perfection of patience of one part.

original: rnam par dbye ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The effort which is the analysis is the perfection of effort of one part.

original: dngos po la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The concentration which is the object of entity is the perfection of concentration of one part.

original: spyod pa dang / sel ba'i 'du shes la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: spyod pa dang / sel ba'i 'du shes la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs gcig pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The wisdom which is the idea of conduct and removal is the perfection of wisdom of one part.

original: 'di dag ni phyogs gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni phyogs gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of one part.

original: de la nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of non-decline?

original: sbyin gnas rnams dang / so so'i skye bo rnams la sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin gnas rnams dang / so so'i skye bo rnams la sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of generosity of non-decline is the generosity of one who is even-minded toward the worthy recipients and ordinary beings.

original: mi gnas pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @55a *//
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @55a *//
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of morality of non-decline is the morality of one who does not abide in the two extremes.

original: phyin pa'o // 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis bsgyur du med pa gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phyin pa'o // 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis bsgyur du med pa gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of patience of non-decline is the patience of one who is not swayed by the eight worldly concerns.

original: bdud kyi mthu khong du chud pas ji ltar nyam thag kyang brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi mthu khong du chud pas ji ltar nyam thag kyang brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The pƒÅramitƒÅ of effort of non-decline is the effort of one who, even when distressed, does not abandon effort because of understanding the power of MƒÅra.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i chos la lhag par mos shing yul la mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i chos la lhag par mos shing yul la mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
translated: The param ita of m editation that is unflagging is the param ita of m editation of one who has attained the sam eness of m ind with respect to objects and who has great conviction in the unobscured Dharma.

original: pa'i chos rnams la thogs pa med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: pa'i chos rnams la thogs pa med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nyams pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom that is unflagging is the w isdom that is unim peded w ith respect to both worldly and transcendent dharm as.

original: de dag ni nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: de dag ni nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas that are unflagging.

original: de la bcos ma ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bcos ma ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas that are not contrived?

original: yongs su brtas pa'i ngo bos chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su brtas pa'i ngo bos chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of giving that is not contrived is the giving of the Dharma and the giving of material things that is done w ith a nature that is fully developed.

original: le lo med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbsam pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin @55b pa'o; ;yo byad dang zang zing gi ched ma yin par thams cad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
analyzed: le lo med pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bsam pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin @55b pa'o; ;yo byad dang zang zing gi ched ma yin par thams cad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
translated: The perfection of morality that is not lazy is the perfection of morality that is not artificial.üîΩThe perfection of patience that is lofty in intention is the perfection of patience that is not artificial.

original: phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort that is not for the sake of material wealth or possessions is the perfection of effort that is not artificial.

original: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation that is free from attachment is the perfection of meditation that is not artificial.

original: rjes su srung ba med par gzhan la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su srung ba med par gzhan la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom which is not protected, but which benefits others, is the uncontrived perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag nyi bcos ma ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag nyi bcos ma ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections that are uncontrived.

original: de la dbul po ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dbul po ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections that are not poor?

original: dbul pos gzhan la phan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos la bdag nyid rnam par smin pa bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dbul pos gzhan la phan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngos la bdag nyid rnam par smin pa bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving that is not poor is the giving of one who is poor, dedicated to the benefit of others, but not engaged for the sake of his own happy destiny and evolutionary development.

original: bde ba 'gror yongs su bsngo ba dang bral ba'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba 'gror yongs su bsngo ba dang bral ba'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality that is not poor is the moral discipline of one who is poor, free from dedication to happy destiny, and free from vows.

original: zang zing gi phyir bzod pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: zang zing gi phyir bzod pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of one who is not poor is the patience that is not for the sake of material reward.

original: zang zing dang 'brel ba'i lus dang sems kyi rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩtshangs par skye bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam @56a *//
analyzed: zang zing dang 'brel ba'i lus dang sems kyi rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // tshangs par skye bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam @56a *//
translated: The perfection of effort of one who is not poor is the effort of body and mind that is not associated with material reward.

original: gtan bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gtan bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation of one who is not poor is the meditation that is dedicated to rebirth in the Brahma world.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nye bar spyod pa 'dres pa mang po thob nas gnas te skyon rtogs kyang mi spong zhing smod par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nye bar spyod pa 'dres pa mang po thob nas gnas te skyon rtogs kyang mi spong zhing smod par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dbul po ma yin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of one who is not poor is the wisdom of one who, having attained many states of mixing with the afflictions and enjoyments, does not abandon or disparage them, realizing their faults.

original: 'di dag ni dbul po ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dbul po ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of one who is not poor.

original: de la phyir mi ldog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
analyzed: de la phyir mi ldog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na //
translated: What are the six perfections of irreversibility?

original: nyan thos dang / rangs sangs rgyas la mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rangs sangs rgyas la mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity of the irreversible is the generosity of one who does not dwell in the fruit of a Stream-winner, etc. to: the enlightenment of a Pratyekabuddha, and who does not turn away from full enlightenment.

original: byang chub ji srid pa'i bar du tshul khrims rgyun chad pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub ji srid pa'i bar du tshul khrims rgyun chad pa med pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of the irreversible is the unbroken moral practice of one who, until he has known full enlightenment, does not turn away from full enlightenment.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos kyi dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos kyi dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of the irreversible is the patience of one who has gone beyond the level of the Disciples and the level of the Pratyekabuddhas.

original: nam thams cad mkhyen pa thob kyi bar du thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nam thams cad mkhyen pa thob kyi bar du thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of vigour of the irreversible is the vigour of one who, until he has known full enlightenment, is endowed with skill in means and does not turn away from full enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan la longs spyod cing dus thams cad du thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab kyis spyod pa gang yin pa @56b de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan la longs spyod cing dus thams cad du thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab kyis spyod pa gang yin pa @56b de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of concentration of the irreversible bodhisattva is the enjoyment of the qualities of desire in all times by means of the wisdom of skillful means.

original: than dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mi 'phrog cing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba las byung ba snying rje chen pos nye bar brtan pa'i shes rab rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steüîΩ/ 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: than dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mi 'phrog cing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba las byung ba snying rje chen pos nye bar brtan pa'i shes rab rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of the irreversible bodhisattva is the great wisdom that arises from the correct view that transcends the world and is not stolen by ≈õrama·πáas, brahmins, ≈õrƒÅvakas, or pratyekabuddhas, and is stabilized by great compassion.üîΩThese are the six perfections of irreversibility.

original: de la rnam par sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six perfections of accomplishment?

original: skyo ba med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: skyo ba med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity that is not discouraged is the perfection of generosity that is accomplished.

original: thos pa nyung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa nyung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality that is practiced with little learning is the perfection of morality that is accomplished.

original: zhe sdang dang zhe sdang ma yin pa la mi lta bar gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang zhe sdang ma yin pa la mi lta bar gnas pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience that is practiced without regard for anger or non-anger is the perfection of patience that is accomplished.

original: ro myang ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ro myang ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort that is practiced with relishing is the perfection of effort that is accomplished.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med pa las phyi rol tu gyur ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med pa las phyi rol tu gyur ba'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditative concentration which is patience that does not fall outside of the selflessness of phenomena is the perfection of meditative concentration of accomplishment.

original: 'jig rten gyi bya ba la gzhol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha @57a *//üîΩrol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi bya ba la gzhol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha @57a *// rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom which is devoted to worldly activities is the perfection of wisdom of accomplishment.

original: 'di dag ni rnam par sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam par sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of accomplishment.

original: de la dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pure perfections?

original: rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity which is not hoping for a karmic maturation is the pure perfection of generosity.

original: le lo med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: le lo med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline which is without laziness is the pure perfection of moral discipline.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of one who has the Dharma of non-objectification is the pure perfection of patience.

original: bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩdngos po med pa dang dmigs pa med pa'i stobs bskyed pa thob pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // dngos po med pa dang dmigs pa med pa'i stobs bskyed pa thob pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The perfection of effort of one who does not harm self or other is the pure perfection of effort.

original: dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation of one who has attained the power of non-objectification and non-entity is the pure perfection of meditation.

original: sgrib pa thams cad bsal cing phyin ci log med pa rnam par sgom pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad bsal cing phyin ci log med pa rnam par sgom pa gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of one who has eliminated all obscurations and who meditates without error is the pure perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di dag ni dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i drug go /
translated: These are the six pure perfections.

original: de la brtan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat are the six steadfast perfections?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na bdud kyis sprul nas dbye bar mi nus shing gdung ba med par bdog pa thams cad yongs @57b su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na bdud kyis sprul nas dbye bar mi nus shing gdung ba med par bdog pa thams cad yongs @57b su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving of the steadfast bodhisattva is the giving of all one has, without being able to be divided by Mara's emanations and without being tormented.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dge mtshan dang bkra shis la mi gnas shing byang chub tu nges par bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dge mtshan dang bkra shis la mi gnas shing byang chub tu nges par bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of the steadfast bodhisattva is the perfection of morality of one who does not dwell on good omens and auspicious signs, and who definitely aspires to enlightenment.

original: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med cing thun mong ma yin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med cing thun mong ma yin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of the steadfast bodhisattva is the perfection of patience of one who is without attachment and aversion, and who is not shared in common.

original: mkhas pas snyems pa med cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyur byed nas mi bskyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pas snyems pa med cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyur byed nas mi bskyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort of the wise, which is unshakable and has the perfection of effort as its cause, is the perfection of stable effort.

original: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos pa dang / dbang po dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag brtan par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngos pa dang / dbang po dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag brtan par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation of one who is stable, which is dedicated to the full maturation of beings and to the stabilization of the faculties and meditative absorptions, is the perfection of stable meditation.

original: chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pas nges par byung zhing thams cad du rmongs pa med par gnas ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /üîΩ'di dag ni brtan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pas nges par byung zhing thams cad du rmongs pa med par gnas ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / 'di dag ni brtan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The wisdom of one who is stable, which is the wisdom that arises from the acceptance of the certainty of the Dharma and which abides in the absence of confusion in all things, is the perfection of stable wisdom.üîΩThese are the six perfections of stability.

original: de la brtun pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brtun pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of steadfastness?

original: dmigs pa med par gnas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩsnyems pa @58a *//
analyzed: dmigs pa med par gnas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtan pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // snyems pa @58a *//
translated: The perfection of giving which is based on the absence of conceptualization is the perfection of giving of the steadfast.

original: med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality which is based on the absence of pride is the perfection of morality of the steadfast.

original: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba la dmigs pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba la dmigs pa'i bzod pa gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience which is based on the abandonment of attachment and aversion is the perfection of patience of the steadfast.

original: ngar 'dzin pa dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs spang ba dang / smad pa'i phyir bdag gi ngal ba spangs nas stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ngar 'dzin pa dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs spang ba dang / smad pa'i phyir bdag gi ngal ba spangs nas stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort which is based on the abandonment of self-mortification, on the abandonment of the manifold sufferings of the world, and on the emptiness which is the negation of the self is the perfection of effort of the steadfast.

original: gang mi rtag pas yid byung ste rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stobs rnyed cing yongs su gtugs pa med pas phye ba gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang mi rtag pas yid byung ste rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stobs rnyed cing yongs su gtugs pa med pas phye ba gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of m editation of one who is diligent is the m editation of one who is disgusted w ith impermanence, who has attained the power of dependent origination, and who is not exhausted.

original: 'dod chags dang bral bar zhugs pa gnyis su med pas rab tu phye ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral bar zhugs pa gnyis su med pas rab tu phye ba'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtun pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The param ita of w isdom of one who is diligent is the w isdom of one who is free from desire and who is distinguished by non-duality.

original: 'di dag ni brtun pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtun pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six param itas of one who is diligent.

original: de la ngoms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ngoms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six paramitas of satisfaction?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thar par yongs su bsngo zhing 'khor bar yongs su mi bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thar par yongs su bsngo zhing 'khor bar yongs su mi bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The param ita of giving of one who is satisfied is the giving of one who dedicates to liberation and not to samsara.

original: nag nog med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nag nog med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality which is not stained is the perfection of morality of satisfaction.

original: byang chub sems @58b dpa'i ngoms pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog can gang yin pa yod de /üîΩtshul khrims des na nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems @58b dpa'i ngoms pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog can gang yin pa yod de / tshul khrims des na nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: There is a perfection of morality of satisfaction for the bodhisattva which is stained.üîΩBy that morality, he aspires to the stage of the ≈õrƒÅvaka or pratyekabuddha.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar smon pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog can no //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar smon pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog can no //
translated: That is the stained perfection of morality.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bkod pa dpag tu med pa dag 'grub par byed cing bla na med pa'i smon lam 'dod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bkod pa dpag tu med pa dag 'grub par byed cing bla na med pa'i smon lam 'dod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience which is the perfection of patience of satisfaction is the perfection of patience of one who desires the unsurpassable aspiration, which accomplishes the immeasurable arrays of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'dus byas rnams la lhag par chags pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas rnams la lhag par chags pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort which is not attached to compounded things is the perfection of effort of one who is satisfied.

original: mthun pa dang mi mthun pas rab tu phye ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mthun pa dang mi mthun pas rab tu phye ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of meditation which is distinguished by being in accord with or in opposition to is the perfection of meditation of one who is satisfied.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su bzung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yongs su bzung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni ngoms pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom which is the taking up of the three doors of liberation is the perfection of wisdom of one who is satisfied.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the

original: ngoms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: ngoms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: six perfections of one who is satisfied.

original: de la 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six mundane perfections?

original: sbyin pa byang chub kyi phyir yongs su mi bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa byang chub kyi phyir yongs su mi bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving which is not dedicated to enlightenment is the mundane perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims rnam pa bdun gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims rnam pa bdun gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the mundane perfection of morality.

original: so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis bzod pa gang @59a *//
analyzed: so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis bzod pa gang @59a *//
translated: The patience that is the power of discernment

original: yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: is the mundane perfection of patience.

original: 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du 'dzin na gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du 'dzin na gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The mundane perfection of effort is the effort of one who is in society.üîΩThe mundane perfection of concentration is the concentration that is dedicated to rebirth.

original: skye bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;'jig rten gyi chos rnams 'dris par gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i shes rabüîΩkyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: skye bar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;'jig rten gyi chos rnams 'dris par gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The mundane perfection of wisdom is the wisdom that is familiar with mundane dharmas.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six mundane perfections of the bodhisattva.

original: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six supramundane perfections?

original: byang chub kyi phyir chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i bsam pa 'grub la /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyir chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i bsam pa 'grub la /
translated: The Blessed One has said, ‚ÄúThe gift of Dharma for the sake of Awakening, and the merit that results from the accomplishment of material giving, are fulfilled by the intention.

original: myur du mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba mchog thob par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: myur du mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba mchog thob par 'gyur ro /
translated: And one quickly attains the supreme peace of NirvƒÅ·πáa.‚Äù

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the supramundane perfection of generosity.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi sdom pa shin tu bsal zhing /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi sdom pa shin tu bsal zhing /
translated: The restraint of the Dharmas of the Disciples and Solitary Sages,üîΩand the cessation of the connection with the instincts,

original: gang na bag chags kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims @59b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang na bag chags kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims @59b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the supramundane perfection of morality.

original: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis bzod pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩmi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas rnam byang chub kyi bar du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dbang
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis bzod pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas rnam byang chub kyi bar du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rtsol ba gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dbang
translated: The patience of the uncontaminated dharmas is the supramundane perfection of patience.üîΩThe effort to bring beings to maturity, from the acceptance of the non-arising of dharmas up to enlightenment, is the supramundane perfection of effort.

original: po dang ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: po dang ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The meditative concentration of the bodhisattva in order to perfect the faculties and knowledge is the supramundane perfection of meditation.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa byang chub phyogs gcig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa byang chub phyogs gcig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom that is supramundane is the wisdom that is not shared in common with the disciples and solitary realizers, and it is the perfection of the wisdom that leads to enlightenment and the perfection of the wisdom that leads to omniscience.

original: 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo //üîΩbam po bzhi pa //
analyzed: 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo // bam po bzhi pa //
translated: These are the six supramundane perfections.

original: de la bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /üîΩsangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang rab sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i bkod pa tshad med pa dang / nga rgyal la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi mos pa'i rnam par smin pa bskal ba grangs med par rgyun mi @60a *//
analyzed: de la bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang rab sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i bkod pa tshad med pa dang / nga rgyal la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi mos pa'i rnam par smin pa bskal ba grangs med par rgyun mi @60a *//
translated: What are the six unsurpassed perfections?

original: chad pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chad pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The unsurpassed perfection of generosity is the immeasurable array of consecrations for the bodhisattvas in the buddhafields, and the uninterrupted ripening of the aspirations of beings who are proud for countless eons.

original: chos kyi 'du shes la gnas nas ngan song gsum yongs su spangs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'du shes la gnas nas ngan song gsum yongs su spangs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality is the moral practice of one who, having the notion of the Dharma, avoids the three evil destinies and takes hold of the Buddha-field.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gser gyi mdog lta bur 'gyur ba; gnod sems thams cad chung ba gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gser gyi mdog lta bur 'gyur ba; gnod sems thams cad chung ba gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience is the patience of one who has a retinue of Bodhisattvas as golden as the color of gold, and who has little malice.

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi 'khrugs pa'i yi dam ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi 'khrugs pa'i yi dam ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of vigor is the vigor of one who, as a Bodhisattva, does not give up his vow to be unshaken.

original: khyim bar gyur pa btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas kyang bsam gtan bzhi chud mi za la 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'khor nyon mongs pa chung pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o
analyzed: khyim bar gyur pa btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas kyang bsam gtan bzhi chud mi za la 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'khor nyon mongs pa chung pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o
translated: The maturation of this giving is that even though one is a householder and lives in the harem, one does not lose the four dhyƒÅnas. The maturation of this morality is that one is born in a Buddha-field with a retinue of few desires. The maturation of this patience is that one is born in a Buddha-field with a retinue of little defilement. The maturation of this effort is that one is born in a Buddha-field with a retinue of little dust. The maturation of this meditation is that one is born in a Buddha-field with a retinue of little sickness.

original: // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin cing tshe dpag tu med pa dang / bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang / 'khor dpag tu med pa'i nang du spobs pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /üîΩ'di dag ni bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin cing tshe dpag tu med pa dang / bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang / 'khor dpag tu med pa'i nang du spobs pa gang yin pa de ni bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste / 'di dag ni bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: The maturation of this wisdom is that one is born in a Buddha-field that is taken care of, with an immeasurable life, immeasurable array, and immeasurable retinue.üîΩThese are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of the immeasurable.

original: de la g-yeng ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la g-yeng ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six pƒÅramitƒÅs of being without distraction?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha @60b rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba'i rnam par smin pas mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni g-yeng ba med pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: yid byung bas rab tu bskyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pas rab tu bskyed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas rab tu bskyed pa dang / ma dad pa rnams kyi dran pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams pa gang yin pa de ni g-yeng ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩbsam gtan la gnas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i chos rnams lhag par mthong yang mi spong la /
analyzed: yid byung bas rab tu bskyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pas rab tu bskyed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas rab tu bskyed pa dang / ma dad pa rnams kyi dran pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams pa gang yin pa de ni g-yeng ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // bsam gtan la gnas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i chos rnams lhag par mthong yang mi spong la /
translated: The perfection of effort that is not distracted is the effort that is generated by shame, by the thought of the next world, by disgust, by the production of disgust, by nirvana, by the production of nirvana, by freedom from desire, by the production of freedom from desire, by the recollection of those who lack faith, and by the roots of virtue of the Buddhas.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is the wisdom of one who, having stood in meditative absorption, enters into the perfection of wisdom, and who, although he sees the things of the desire realm, does not reject them.üîΩ

original: / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang spyod @61a *//
analyzed: / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang spyod @61a *//
translated: The Dharma of the bodhisattvas is also practiced.

original: la skyon dang skyon med pa'ang rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni g-yeng pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: la skyon dang skyon med pa'ang rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni g-yeng pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The realization of faults and non-faults is the perfection of wisdom without distraction.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g-yeng ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g-yeng ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of the bodhisattvas without distraction.

original: de la mi 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of non-revolving?

original: byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pa la gnas pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pa la gnas pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The generosity of the bodhisattvas who abide in the absence of reference points is the perfection of generosity that does not revolve.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The morality that does not turn back from the dharmas of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and buddhas is the perfection of morality that does not revolve.

original: ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa chad cing /
analyzed: ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa chad cing /
translated: The patience that cuts off the grasping of ‚ÄúI‚Äù and ‚Äúmine‚Äù

original: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba las dben pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba las dben pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience of one who does not revolve in samsara is the patience of one who is detached from attachment and anger.

original: de sems can gzhan gyi ngor blta zhing ye shes las mi ldog pa pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de sems can gzhan gyi ngor blta zhing ye shes las mi ldog pa pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of effort of one who does not revolve in samsara is the effort of one who is not discouraged by the suffering of others, who is not discouraged by the great task of helping others, who is not discouraged by the great task of helping others, and who is not discouraged by the long duration of the task.

original: mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa'i chos rnams yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩthe tshom yang dag par bcom zhing mtshan ma med pas rab tu phye la /
analyzed: mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa'i chos rnams yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // the tshom yang dag par bcom zhing mtshan ma med pas rab tu phye la /
translated: The perfection of meditation of one who does not revolve in samsara is the meditation of one who is not attached to the bliss of meditation, who is not attached to the bliss of liberation, and who is not attached to the bliss of the concentrations and the immeasurables.

original: byang chub tu phyogs gcig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes @61b khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub tu phyogs gcig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes @61b khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni mi 'khor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The perfection of wisdom of one who does not revolve in samsara is the wisdom of one who has destroyed doubt, who has penetrated the signless, and who has the special wisdom of omniscience that is one-sided toward enlightenment.

original: 'di dag ni mi 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
analyzed: 'di dag ni mi 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /
translated: These are the six perfections of not cycling in samsara.

original: de la 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are the six perfections of cycling in samsara?

original: ji srid du dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du rnam par smin pa sems can dang lhan cig tu 'jug pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ji srid du dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du rnam par smin pa sems can dang lhan cig tu 'jug pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of giving of cycling in samsara is the perfection of giving that matures sentient beings and engages with them as long as the holy Dharma has not disappeared.

original: dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste nam mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du rab tu 'jug pa spang ba'i phyir gnas pa bkra shis pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste nam mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du rab tu 'jug pa spang ba'i phyir gnas pa bkra shis pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of morality of cycling in samsara is the auspicious abiding that occurs from the time of abiding in the Joyous Heaven until the time of nirvana, in order to abandon engagement.

original: skye bo mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas shing dus su yongs su bsngos la /
analyzed: skye bo mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas shing dus su yongs su bsngos la /
translated: Abiding in order to ripen many beings,

original: yang dag pa de kho na dang lhan cig pa'i bzod pa 'khor ba dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa de kho na dang lhan cig pa'i bzod pa 'khor ba dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni 'khor ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of patience in samsara is the patience that is in accord with the true reality of things.
